I'd been wondering all this time, whether there's any meaning to a failed love. Is it something that will disappear, the same as something that never existed. Now I know, there is meaning...there was a meaning...right here.
To cry because there is something you want to do and to cry because you can't find it. Which is more painful? The only thing I can say is even with all the words I have now, I can't stop her tears.
To have the one you think is your ideal self standing in front of you, it's tough...

To wish for your own happiness is sometimes coupled with another's unhappiness. Since I couldn't pray for my own happiness, I prayed to the moon in the night sky for the happiness of the one whose warm hand I held.
When we were together, my heart felt tight, too tight to even drink water. If that's called love, then it was really just me who was in love. Just me.
When I'm away from you, even though I can't be around crowds, I want to go see you.
I probably won't be able to look forward to summer for a long time. My chest will hurt. My tears will be overflowing. But this warmth in my hands and these summer memories will live on in my heart.
Time might separate us some day. But, even still, until then, let's stay together.
Do you dislike that someone you once knew has become someone new without your knowing?
Hope brings me pain... if I didn't have any hope at all, I might never have known such agony.
Space extends infinitely. The probability of an encounter may be low, but it isn't nonexistent.

Even shining stars that seem very close are actually far, far apart, separated by many light years. Perhaps we're like the stars we all gaze upon, shining alone in the empty void of space. Having faith that one day, our light might reach someone.
If there's no eye to see, there's no difference between the darkness and the light.
When I think too much, my brains get itchy.
*to Sophie* You're wearing that hat? After all the magic I used to make your dress pretty?
Sorry, I've had enough of running away, Sophie. Now I've got something I want to protect. It's you.
A heart's a heavy burden.
They say that the best blaze burns brightest, when circumstances are at their worst.
When you're old, all you want to do is stare at the scenery. It's so strange. I've never felt so peaceful before.
Why do you get so cold when you're old? I'm fatter than ever, and yet, the wind blows right through me.
Ant king , you believe I cannot pray with a single arm? A prayer comes from the heart. If the heart achieves the correct form, it becomes emotions and emotions can be manifested.
There are liars who only lie when there's a reason to, and there are liars who also lie without a reason.
If I can get my target to move as I want, I've succeeded as a Hunter.
You should enjoy the little detours. To the fullest. Because that's where you'll find the things more important than what you want.

Being able to cry for his companion. I was thinking you couldn't cry, nor did you have a heart. But in that case why... even a little... don't you share that feeling... with all the people you kill !!
If you want to get to know someone, find out what makes them angry.
In my next life, I want to be me, and meet you again.
It takes a mere second for treasure to turn to trash.
Right now, I'm letting you live. And I'll continue to keep you alive... until you've grown enough to become worth killing.
You must be prepared to face the worst possible scenarios. Because harsh reality strikes without warning.
Assassination — It's the family trade. We all take it up. My folks see me as an exceptional prospect. But I don't see that I should have to live up to their expectations.
If I ignore a friend I have the ability to help, wouldn't I be betraying him?
Nanika, will you forgive me for being a bad big brother?
Not killing people is really hard. Clean living is tough.
People only find me interesting because they can't tell whether I'm serious or not.
When I say it doesn't hurt me, that means I can bear it.
Who wants to have their life planned out for them.
Whenever humans encounter the unknown, they tend to lose perspective.
I was trying to take the easy way out by running away from everything. No matter the pain, I will keep living. So when I die, I'll feel I did the best I could.
A beast in human's clothing understands better than anyone how people want to be treated.
I do not fear death. I fear only that my rage will fade over time.
The only principle is that there is no principles.
For the right price, you can buy not only treasures, but dreams, hearts and even people's lives!
Ha-ha these humans are definitely foolish creatures.  Think as hard as those weak brains of yours can manage. Do you humans ever listen to the cries of mercy coming from pigs and cows you slaughter?
Violence is the greatest power of the world!
If you want to get to know someone, you need to make an effort to learn why they're angry.
Human potential for evolution is limitless.

Normally, as people love and are loved, they feel happiness. When I am hated by people, that is when I feel happiness. And then I want to tear apart and inflict unimaginable harm to the things I love. But is that really all that strange, I wonder?
But the big difference is who I work for. I'd rather die than be a yes-man to someone I don't even like.

I've always gone to any lengths to avoid facing danger and risk, hiding myself within  a safe cage, where no one could hurt me. I hated myself for it.. But I couldn't change myself.. Friends and teachers encouraged me, but I never truly listened, considering it the logic of the strong. Yet somehow... A boy with less than half my strength managed to break my cage!
Love and hate are two sides of the same coin.
There are two things that collectors always want. The first is any item of extreme rarity. The second is colleagues to whom they can brag about their collection.
I find myself hard to understand sometimes.

If someone didn't have any pride, wouldn't they also be lacking in self-confidence? If someone was free of greed, wouldn't they have trouble supporting their family? And if people didn't envy one another, wouldn't they stop inventing new things?
If you can never get angry at anything, that probably means you have nothing that you like, either.
We don't know if trying our best will help, but we do know, that if we don't try our best, it won't help for sure!
You don't have to worry about being special or normal compared to everyone else! It doesn't matter who it is. So as long as they think you're special, then you're special.
Every individual must be aware of themselves. If not, those who watch them think fools of themselves.
No amount of passion can overcome a lack of technical expertise.
Those with talent who aren't aware of themselves cause pain for those who have none.
Oreki, you're strange!
Don't care anything and do not do anything that's a waste of energy.
I don't care if no one likes me. I wasn't created in this world to entertain everyone.
I'm not against socializing, so long as it's not tiring.
I'm not lazy, I'm just conserving energy.
I'm not stupid. I'm just too lazy to show how smart I am.
If I don't have to do it, I won't. If I have to do it, I'll make it quick.

People remember their high school days as the high point of their lives. People say these things because everyone holds fond memories of their time in high school; however, I doubt that every high school student would want to remember their school life that way. For example, if neither studying, nor sports, nor socializing are of interest to someone, what then? What if there are students who prefer to keep a low profile? Though I guess that would be a pretty lonely way to live.
The best way to tame a mystery is with another mystery.
The inexperienced draw attention by acting differently.
The more inexperienced you are, the more you want to show off.
“Expectations” are what you have when you have given up. Expectations are born from a despairingly large difference in skill.
A database can't draw conclusions.
A joke only lasts for a moment, if it leaves a misunderstanding, it becomes a lie.
Even if I did win, it was boring. How can it be interesting unless you win in an interesting way?
I won't ever be the best at anything. Or rather, you might say that I've stopped trying to be.
People who are confident in themselves never talk about expectations. "Expectation" is a word rooted in giving up. It leaves you with no other choice. It makes it obvious that you're powerless.
Whatever I do, I'll always be me. I won't tone myself down to fit in.
Any event is a personal episode, where only those involved comprehend what's happening.

Let go of me. It'll all be in vain anyway. No matter how gently you hold onto me. No matter what kind of expression you look at me with. In the end, you guys are... only my imagination. I have a slight addiction to fantasy. I sometimes mix the reality that I don't want to face with warm illusions. That's why I can think of "that" as one of those moments.
No matter who you are, some things, once lost, can never be regained.
Just as water can overfill a container. Madness is all the same.
When the guarantee of safety is dangled right in front of their eyes, humans will turn their eye from probability.
With death staring you in the face, you truly understand what it means to be alive.
Do you know the origin of the word "utopia"? The English philosopher, Thomas More, created this word with intense irony in mind. In Greek, it means "A place that does not exist".
In this world with only despair, how do you live?
No matter what you do, it's all futile in this world.
Whether it's on the other side of the planet, or right in front of one's eyes, as long as one is safe, it doesn't matter how many others die. Isn't that humanity?
Life is built upon the taking of another life. If you have the resolve to kill, then you have the obligation to eat.

Somehow, the sea at night seems terribly dark. As if right beyond this point, the world might end.
But I'm not afraid. Because mornings without you are much scarier.
If reality is nothing more than what is in our mind, then what is the difference between this world and a dream?
Dressing up on the outside won’t change what’s on the inside.
Unnecessary thoughts will only interfere with your plays.
Certain individuals can change the entire outlook of the team with their overwhelming abilities.
People like you will never understand... Although it is true that many humans are stupid, immature, and high school drop outs... But! Humans possess the power of possibilities!

I think that sometimes things just won't go the way we want them to. And every day there's bound to be something that makes us mad when there's nothing we can do to change the state of affairs. But that's not entirely true, either. We have to give these kinds of things some real thought as well. If we're sitting back and waiting for the future to arrive - we don't have anything invested in tomorrow. I don't want a tomorrow like that.

There's a limit to the strength of people who are isolated. If we do the best we can we should be fine. We don't grab a hold of the entire future. Let's just think about grabbing tomorrow. I think that's plenty for us, don't you?
No matter how strong the pain is, it's our duty to move forward. You're wrong for running away from reality.

data.show: Inou Battle wa Nichijou-kei no Naka de
data.quote: Listen up, Cookie. Summer break is a break. We forget about homework. That's common sense. Understand?

data.show: Inou Battle wa Nichijou-kei no Naka de
data.quote: Anyone can cheer for you and your dreams, but only the people closest to you can worry about you.

data.show: Inou Battle wa Nichijou-kei no Naka de
data.quote: Even if you're trying to protect someone, you must never use your power to hurt others.

data.show: Inou Battle wa Nichijou-kei no Naka de
data.quote: It's my belief that powers aren't meant to hurt people. Nor are they meant to make others happy.

data.show: Inou Battle wa Nichijou-kei no Naka de
data.quote: Where will we be in five or ten years from now? No one knows. All we know right now, all we can see right now, is what's right in front of us. That's why we'll always live our 'right now' to the fullest!

data.show: Inou-Battle wa Nichijou-kei no Naka de
data.quote: No matter how much this world may change, I shall always remain myself.
It is a tasteless life if you don't have something you regret.
People become themselves through their encounters. With different things, people, and emotions.
Eating together makes food taste better and makes friends grow closer.
My only ambition is simply to kill as many people as humanly possible.
[to Kagome, angry at her for saying she believes in him] You are nuts! This sword is good for nothing! Me, I'll live, I'm half demon. You though, you ain't got a chance.
[to Sesshoumaru after he steals the Tetsuaiga] Blah, blah, blah. A guy gets his hands on a new sword, and already he's lookin' for a soap box to stand on and preach it to the world!
*to Kikyo* I swear... I will never let Naraku harm you.
Are you going to keep staring at me because it's ticking me off. If you got something to say, say it.
Are you stupid?
As long as she's alive and well, that's all I hope for. I can't bear to see another woman die.
Don't be stupid. You're just a human. So back off, shut up, and butt out. *to Kagome*
Don't you faint on me, you stupid girl.

Half breed or full breed, to me it don't matter. But when you insult my mother, that's when I get angry. For her sake then if for nothing else... I'm gonna make you pay! [he jumps up and attacks Sesshoumaru, hitting him for the first time]
Heh, I guess somehow without me knowing, it just feels so natural now, to have Kagome by my side.
Hey, Shippo. Your village called.They're asking for their idiot!
I can't save you. I can't do anything to help you, except stay like this. If only I could stop time.
I didn't say get naked, stupid. I just can't stand seeing you in those clothes.
I will hunt down Kikyou's killer and avenge her death
I would come up there and finish you off. If you didn't look half dead already.
I'd rather give up my eye, than give up his sword. Maybe I'm not so worthless after all.

I'm a half-demon, more egotistical and greedy than any other living creature — that's what human beings are, right?.. But with human blood flowing through my veins, I never give up! Don't you understand? When you have someone to protect, your power increases multifold!
I'm gonna slit your stomach, take out your guts, and put them in a bowl. By the time I'm through with you, you're going to wish it was you who was dead.
I've heard similar threats from a number of poor fools whose memories I keep alive by dancing on their tombstones!

Neither one nor the other, not a demon, but not a human either, no place no belong… I thought the only way was to carve out your own place, by force; that’s how I survived. And by the time I knew what was happening, I was all alone…
Only a fool refuses a woman who offers herself.
People like you... are the reason why people like me need medication.
Say please, before asking for favor.
That's pretty bad when you can even give a half demon the creeps. *to Kagome*
There was no place for me, so I had to make one for myself, and then I realized, I had a place, but I was the only one in it. I didn't know any other way to live.
Think you're pretty smart, you old hag. (to Kaede)
Well excuse me for making you sleep in the wild all the time.
Windscar!
You got two legs and a heart beat. What's stopping you?
You sent me into a battle armed with a mere hunch?
[repeatedly] Inuyasha, sit, boy.
[with a bow and arrow ready to fire] Not as pretty as his, huh? What would you know about it? You live in a time where they don't even have SHAMPOO.
He's thanking me? That can't be good. *about Inuyasha*
How could I forget? He's into dead girls.
I can't compete with Kikyo, because, after all, I'm still alive
I want you to be happy. I want you to laugh a lot. I don't know what exactly I'll be able to do for you, but I'll always be by your side.
I was wrong, kill him.
It's nice not to be alone.
Maybe it's just the morning light, but he looks pretty cool standing there with his sword. *about Inuyasha*
Someone the exact opposite of Inuyasha.  That's the perfect guy for me.
I despise you with my last breath. My spirit will not forget that all consuming hatred.  So long that you live, my spirit can not be free. *to Inuyasha*
I loathe all things, I despise every living creature who's bound to time.
I wish for a heart. A heart of the man whom I'll never allow to forget me.
Inuyasha, after meeting you I renounced my postion as a shrine priestess. I became an ordinary woman. I longed to embrace you like this when I was alive...
Inuyasha, you and I were fated to never meet again.
Once the thread of fate is tangled, it cannot be undone.
Stop coming after the jewel. I do not wish to waste more arrows.
The future is not a straight line. There are many different pathways. We must try to decide that future for ourselves.
To live is to die, to die is to live. Pure is unpure, unpure is pure.
Tragic he said. I'm tragic?
You vile beast. I despise you. You loathsome half man.
*while stomping on Inuyasha* Lay down, be silent, sleep, rest, sleep... how many times do I have to tell you...
I must find a place to pawn this off.
Life itself is a frightening image for every human being... being strong in life isn't easy.
This may come as something of a surprise, but I'm a sore loser.
What good is this cursed hand if I can't protect the woman I love?
You're a real sight for sore eyes. *to Kagome*
I am not going to kill you - I am going to break you.
Well, well, if it isn't the holy monk.
You're not as slow as you look, monk.
But is it necessary to keep stroking my leg while you talk. *to Miroku*
[after witnessing a small argument between Inuyasha and Kagome] Inuyasha, your patience with this creature is astonishing to me. You protect her, indulge her, even seem to love her.
*to Inuyasha* I quite miss you as well, little brother.
*to Inuyasha* You fight as though you're still a child.
*to Inuyasha* Your stupidity knows no boundaries. Run and hide while you can.
All that for a memory and a dead mortal girl. If I've known that this is all it took to make you fight, I would have killed her sooner. (to Inuyasha)
Be not a fool, I have no such time to waste.
Can it be that I'm afraid or is it merely I know not my own limit?
The little man is having trouble holding his sword. *to Inuyasha*
This scheme of yours is beneath me.  Should it fail, Jaken, you will die.
[about 500 feet behind InuYasha] I can see why being called a mutt by Koga would upset him... but now that I see him sitting there sniffing the ground he does look like a dog.
Aahhh someone saves me.
Just apologize, even if you don't mean it. *to some kid, about Inuyasha*
Kagome, what do you have in your bag? Rocks?
Six innocent peasants down, hundreds of thousand more to go.
That's why Kagome sent me, so I can protect you from being protected by him.
Why am I always the one handing out apologies?
You shouldn't talk to yourself. People will wonder.

Math is like a puzzle or a game. There's a clear answer, and you're going on a journey to find it. But there are many ways to reach that answer. That's why it's so fulfilling when you find the solution. There are ways to find an answer promptly, or more freely. Even roundabout methods can bring you to a definite solution. The method may not be pretty, but when the answer you worked hard to discover is right, it makes you happy.
Regretting the past forever won't solve anything.
Who a person hangs out with is their choice. And I couldn't care less about rumors. Until I tried talking to them myself, I wouldn't know...
Yeah, if I saw her smiling to herself while reading this, I might think it was creepy. But there's something wrong with people who talk trash and laugh behind another's back, too.
You can only become friends by talking to people and finding out whether you get along.

There are things I don't want to forget... Memories of time spent with friends. Memories of time spent with her alone. Memories are important. But there's something even more important... That's to continue making memories.
People's feelings can change. You may hate someone today, but you might come to love that person tomorrow.
Hell is in human heart.
Human is an existence full of sin.
I shall cleanse away thy bitterness...
Once the revenge is dealt, you are required to pay the compensation.
Pitiful shadow cloaked in darkness. Thy action cause men pain and suffering. Thy hollow soul drowns in thy sins. How would you like to see what death is like?
This is vengeance, so I am to ferry you to hell.
We will take revenge on your behalf.
When one person is cursed, two graves are dug.
You are coming with me, we are going to hell.
Your grievance shall be avenged.
Shining brightly even for a split second is better than living a dull-grey life for eternity.
If you pity my existence, please eat me.
A politician in the past once said: "My secretaries did it all."

I've done it! After years of climbing the ladder, I've finally made it! Now that I have control of all good, no one can stop me! I now rule the human race! First, I will restore all the long-abandoned customs! Control the people! Control the goods! Control the economy! Once that's done, I can easily take over the nation! I'm in position to wield all of the power! Time to implement a dictatorial democracy! I can be a tyrant!

And so... I have written down the lesson I've learned from this vital experience in form of a title suitable for a business reference book: "Never hold meetings. The outcome is determined before the meeting begins."
Hide the truth. Manipulate information. Use intimidation.
I always thought of humans as intelligent dominoes, since they tend to follow each other.
I bet that when they run out of delicacy points, girls turn into old ladies.
I should use a cheerful joke to lighten the mood. Would you like a snack? Or, maybe I should snack on you instead?
I woke up feeling refreshed, after dreaming about a long shower. But of course, it was an illusion.
I've never been so grateful to have walls to shut the world out.
It's quite educational, seeing the thought process of someone in charge.
It's simply fun to be part of a group sharing the same interests, regardless of what those interests are.
Items to invent: Bed, massage chair, humidifier, rubber band, Rube Goldberg Machine, religion... Religions are invented? I've learned something new.
Necessary murder. Man must kill to live. That hasn't changed, even with humanity's decline. The situation has reached the point in which escape and refusal are no longer options, so I must act.
So, who should we hold responsible? Compensation. Punishment. If you didn't want any problems you shouldn't have taken risks.
The chickens have earned their right to live, while the humans will go hungry.

The devil made me do it. It was all his fault. Yup, all him. Look at them shake. I don't blame them. The second I spotted them, I put a lid on the tin and ran away. In other words, I kidnapped them. Is there any way to spin this? I mean, any way to solve the problem?
The toilet is a wonder of civilization. It is a grand invention. It preserves human dignity.
They have no faces, no mouths... Their slimy bodies are completely hairless! They are... the skinned chickens!... Or you could just say they're chickens.
This is how culture spreads. When someone has a new idea, it is immediately copied.
We must demonstrate that we took action, even if our action was meaningless.
Well, nothing in life is ever certain.
Yes! One small candy for man, one giant candy for new mankind.
Children aren't sweet or innocent. The weird ones are left unchecked. It's rare to find anyone you can trust!
I found a job after graduation, but it was at the school. So much for sentimental farewells.
Love is more afraid of change than destruction.

Suppose that you were sitting down at a table. The napkins are in front of you, which napkin would you take? The one on your ‘left’? Or the one on your ‘right’? The one on your left side? Or the one on your right side? Usually you would take the one on your left side. That is ‘correct’ too. But in a larger sense on society, that is wrong. Perhaps I could even substitute ‘society’ with the ‘Universe’. The correct answer is that ‘It is determined by the one who takes his or her own napkin first.’ …Yes? If the first one takes the napkin to their right, then there’s no choice but for others to also take the ‘right’ napkin. The same goes for the left. Everyone else will take the napkin to their left, because they have no other option. This is ‘society’… Who are the ones that determine the price of land first? There must have been someone who determined the value of money, first. The size of the rails on a train track? The magnitude of electricity? Laws and Regulations? Who was the first to determine these things? Did we all do it, because this is a Republic? Or was it Arbitrary? NO! The one who took the napkin first determined all of these things! The rules of this world are determined by that same principle of ‘right or left?’! In a Society like this table, a state of equilibrium, once one makes the first move, everyone must follow! In every era, this World has been operating by this napkin principle. And the one who ‘takes the napkin first’ must be someone who is respected by all. It’s not that anyone can fulfill this role… Those that are despotic or unworthy will be scorned. And those are the ‘losers’. In the case of this table, the ‘eldest’ or the ‘Master of the party’ will take the napkin first… Because everyone ‘respects’ those individuals.
What is "Courage"? Courage is owning your fear!
Jojo, being human means having limits. I've learned something. The more carefully you scheme, the more unexpected events come along

Courage must know fear and make fear its own! Fear upsets breathing! Conquer fear and your breath will never fail you! Hamon breathing comes from courage! A good human is a brave human! Courage is a marvel of humanity!
Advantages and disadvantages come hand in hand. That is inevitable
A road is something that you make yourself.
Evil is when you use the weak for your own gain and crush them under your foot.
Women tend to kill when it's not necessary. They kill for reasons of passion. For trivial reasons like love and hate.
Even peaceful people, given a gun, can go crazy. Afterwards they can't even understand what led them to do it.
When the hunger seemed to kill me, I was wondering if the world hates me. I can't explain it, but I still love the world.
There are so many weapons scattered across my path that it makes me wonder if this world is made of little more than lead and gunpowder.
I devour the five lands and drain the three seas, yet only the sky is impossible to reach. With this body lacking wings, hands, or legs. I am the World Serpent. My name is Jormungand.
Now you know what fear does to you. In the face of death you thought.
I hate humans. I find the thought that I'm from the same species to be depressing.
I think running a restaurant would fit you better than being an assassin.
I'm an arms dealer anyway. There's no point in fearing what I sell.
In this world, guns are always within arm's reach, and sadly they are more trustworthy than kindness.
It is man's heart which sets the world aflame.
Kindness is weakness. Your weakness will delay the trigger by a moment. This world doesn't treat kindness kindly.
Modern-day saints carry assault rifles, and spread the word of God with their bullets.

People who kill too much, turn into dragons one day. Beasts that rule the land atop piles of money and fly the skies with authority. They become more and more violent, until they can no longer understand the language of men. We cannot allow dragons to remain in this world, even though we are the ones from which they are spawned. To slay a dragon is the greatest of honors.
Put a steel mask on your face and armor on your heart.
The world is lucky! Despite of how much I hate the world, I have decided to mend it rather than destroy it.
Weapons are used by soldiers on the battlefield. If you have never used them yourself, you have no idea what you're selling.
You can't direct armies from your bedsheets.
You get free hatred for everything you sell. I've amassed a real supply of it, so I'd like to sell it too... But no one wants to buy it from me!

data.show: Jubei-Chan 2: The Counterattack of Siberia Yagyu
data.quote: The way of the sword lies in one's heart. As long as you have your heart, you can live even without the sword.
I don't believe in destiny. I always thought that it was nothing more than an overlap of coincidences. But if a meeting changes from chance to inevitable, that's what we call destiny.
Even if you hate it or whatever, I'll never let go of you. If you run away, I'll probably come after you and lock you up.
I am not a person who only wants to receive things from him, I want to be the person who can give things to him.
I don't want the precious time we have together to be taken away by anyone!
I have a lot of different words desperately trying to get my message across. However, you, were able to pass on what you wanted to say with just a few of them.
I would be nothing without you.
The moment you challenged me, you had already lost.
To be able to stay beside a beloved one is the special privilege of a friend.
To everything that comes near you, I am jealous.
When you fight hard and fail, the regret is easier to get past than the regret of not trying.
When you love someone, I think it's only natural to worry about what they love.
Why you ask? That's the stupidest question I've ever heard.  The answer is obvious.  Because I want to! *to Misaki Takahashi*

Is there a limit to how much you can love somebody? No matter how much I hurt him or get hurt by him, I find myself far from hating him, actually hoping that those wounds will scar, like burns...because then you can never forget me.
No matter how much is in your heart, if you don’t tell that person, then it’s meaningless.
He is so twisted that if he sees someone wandering around lost, he's the kind of guy who will screw and toy around with the poor soul before he even bothers to help...IF he even bothers to help!
I'm so happy I think I might die.
It pisses me off... Like a knife, he violates me even through my ears.
The pain... the pleasure... and the shame all drive me crazy.
To be loved out of sympathy is more devastating than to be rejected.
I wonder... isn't it that when you become an adult, you have freedom to explore such a large world. I wonder why is it I feel that the world is so constricted at this moment.
Why is it that I'm anxious when I love him?.. No. I love him, that's why I'm anxious. It's because I love you that even if I take off the armor I've worn all my life, I'll still chase after you.
I could give you baseless hope through empty encouragement, but you'd just make the same mistake again. You won't live long if you don't own up to your failures.
The day when you'll finally understand me... will never come.
Strength always comes with responsibilities.
Not many can do the “right thing” when it counts.
Our bodies get bigger, but our hearts get torn up.
The final curtain falls at the very moment a person gives up.

I hate people with a big heart. All they do is look down on you from above. They don’t give a damn about the petty struggles of the people serving under them. If that’s what it means to be a king, then that’s just sad and pathetic.
The day when you'll understand me... will never come...
Regardless of who I was in the past or what I did, I feel like "me" of the present should take responsibility.
Well, it's not a big deal or anything... but I was almost killed.
I'll be waiting for you to get your asses back here!
No, she's hiding something. But what could it be? Snacks? Guitar? Wait, maybe ton-chan.
I’m scared of hot and cold. In winter, I hide under the heating table and in summer, I lie in bed and do nothing.
To the me back then, you don’t need to worry. You’ll soon find something you can do, something you can set your heart on.
You'll never be able to go anywhere unless you learn how to let go.
When people immerse themselves in their own world and other people around them start doing something, they can’t help but feel very lonely.
Ah, my most ugly heart. I hate, hate, hate it, so I can’t help but sneer all the time.
Meals are always better with lots of people at the table.
I can stand not eating or sleeping, but I absolutely would not be able to live without my computer.
The smile of you, who flew through this window and died, I won't ever forget, not even tomorrow.
The others taught me something. That one needn't fear the future. That one needn't hate the world. From now on, the world will not simply be my fantasy. It will be our one and only, real future.
Even if you want to tell him and want to be with him, sometimes, that's not enough.
Even when you want to say something, there are times when you'll lose the chance to.
Never show your stupid self in public.
About Usui, I really don't know anything at all. It's mortifying... Yet I already don't want him to turn away.
Don't ever lie, even if it's about your feelings.

I don't know much about you. You were the one who selfishly entered my world...yet you immediately plunged into silence. What were you thinking? Did you really pick on me just because it was fun? Which one is serious and which one of it is just a joke? That's enough now, making me all messed up like this.
I guess I'm a girl who lacks self-awareness as one, or just too manly, eh?
I'm a little grateful to you. I wonder if I'll forget these feelings too.
It's painful when you get disappointed by the person you look up to.
The aura of offensive smell has come to such a strong extent that you can even see it!!
Usui, you perverted, outer spaceman human being!
I really don't get it. Why don't you tell her how you feel if you care for her so much? Why would you lie like that and keep yourself from pursuing her?
Ayuzawa, you are the first person ever to appear in my life and able to make me a mess.
How far do you want me to suppress myself so that you'll be satisfied?
I don't want others to hear the words that I've been waiting anxiously for... I want to be the only one to hear them.
I just want to keep looking at her.

I'm actually a hardcore otaku who likes maids more than having three meals a day. And I only read books related to maids. Also, I only visit maid cafes. Of course, I also collect maid figurines. I play games which feature female maids and it turns me on so much. Then I wear maid uniforms and jump in joy. I'll take my leave now.
If it is with Ayuzawa, whatever I do, wherever I am, I am happy. So it's okay.
It's fine, I'll come to save you as much as you want. I'll make you fall for me as much as you wish. Leave this to your master.
It's okay, no need to thank me or say anything else. I will always be there for you, I will make you fall for me over and over again.
Love, passion, why do we get caught up by such troublesome feelings? The mind couldn't ever get things straight, and you lose control to know what is sensible. Deep down it's all so vexing.
That's exactly the way it should be. Doing only unexpected things, otherwise, I'll lose my reputation as a perverted outer-space human.
The president did say please.
Walking along the path that she chose, without being affected by others... in this sense, white is her color...in another sense, it also makes me want to put more colors on her.
Well, I won't be disappointed, no matter what you do.
Your sudden smiles always surprise me. But are dangerous enough to make my heart race.

Kings do not become kings by themselves. If the poor raise up together, declaring that they don't want any money, kings will be overthrown. However, poor seek money so that they can become kings themselves. Which in turn only strengthens the position of the current king.

Normally, those people would never wake up from their fantasy worlds. They live meaningless lives. They waste their precious days over nothing. No matter how old they get, they'll continue to say, "My real life hasn't started yet. The real me is still asleep, so that's why my life is such garbage." They continue to tell themselves that. And they age. Then die. And on their deathbeds, they will finally realize: the life they lived was the real thing. People don't live provisional lives, nor do they die provisional deaths. That's a simple fact! The problem... is whether they realize that simple fact.
The amount of money one owns ultimately decides the victor. This doesn't stop within the walls of a casino, or it's cash flow. It's a rule that forms the basis for a capitalist society!

The only one who can decide your worth.. is you. If you want to earn something, you need to reach out for it. Pro-athletes give up their teenage years to train. Business owners put up collateral to borrow money. That's how it always works. To make your ambitions come true, you have to take risks. The larger the ambition the greater the risk. That might involve time or enough work to affect your lifespan... So make your choice. Live in peace as a wannabe or risk losing it all to reach the very top. You're the one who needs to decide.
Happiness isn't something you divide in halves.
I'm neither a soldier, nor a brave man. Not to mention that running away isn't the same thing as losing. You only truly lose by dying. So as long you're alive, you win!
Don't make it sound so easy! Don't you realize how hard I had to study? I worked hard... I worked so hard!
I am the Defender of the pride of New Hell...!!
I really don't know what I should believe in anymore... Even if I believe I'm doing the right thing... Nothing goes well at all.
...Have I... Stumbled upon a brand new shitty game again...?

Are flaws really bad? Because they are not perfect, they become worried. They don't stand still and instead move forward. After they become perfect, they will stand still. Incompleteness is the ideal.
Don't be upset because of what you can't do. Do what you do best, live as carefree and optimistically as you can, because some people aren't able to do that.
Humans shouldn't just disregard something they cannot comprehend while also trying to define it.
I can see the ending!
If a girl chases after you, it's likely a trap.
If everyone were perfect, there would be no need to look out for others. Sympathy or love is needed because people are imperfect. A perfect human cannot love anyone.
If the ideal world can be found in a bad game, it can be found in the real world as well.

In the first place, the logic that says "those who play games are kids" is itself an allusion, therefore one might say that shoehorning reality into your stubborn dualism is already a criticism of the self. In short, humans can only recognize reality through the filter called "me" and so they are unable to escape the constraints of their uncanny existence.
Reality is just a crappy game!
The game design for life is flawed.
The world doesn't get to decide whether my life is boring, fun, or ordinary, because that's my decision to make. As long as I have the will, nothing is impossible!
There is always a chance of success, and if there isn't any, I'll just have to make one.
True, I've given up on the real world. However, I haven't given up on myself.
Water is the greatest enemy of games.
You keep imposing your ideals on them. Don't worry about other people. You only need to do what you think is right.
Watching messy troubles from the sidelines is a hobby of mine.
They say that ill weeds grow apace, but... You know, the nice ones don't live long.

On a Monday, God created the world. 
On Tuesday, God drew the line between Order and Chaos. 
On Wednesday, God arranged each and every number. 
On Thursday, God permitted the ebb and flow of Time. 
On Friday, God explored every nook and cranny of the world. 

On Saturday, God rested. 
And on Sunday, God... 
forsook the world.
We simply cannot see the world as it is. The world people see is nothing more than how our brains translate it. In other words, it's subjective.

Wishes shouldn't be granted. They're better off not coming true. When their wishes aren't granted, people actually put in effort. It's because they don't come true that people make progress. But if all their wishes come true, people won't be able to move forward anymore, you know?

I do want to die. But I want to die happily. Like I have for others, I want someone to wave me off. My friends, my wife, and my children... Making them mourn for me, making them long for me, and leaving things that I should have done behind... That is how I want to die.
Remember this. The only words that can keep you alive are "I want to live."
Schools are facilities where human society secludes the troublesome children by age criteria.
The probability of you remaining yourself until the day you die is extremely low. The hopeless spark you have now will be corrupted and in the most awful way there is.
Violence, greed, slaughter, corruption, defeat, failure, immorality, humiliation… These are everywhere. As long as you live, you will face them.
(Her dad) He'd always tell me that family isn't about being related by blood. Living under the same roof and caring for each other is what family is all about.
Songs are great. They reach people no matter how far they are. Even to people dear to you, who are no longer here.
Babies are jobless when they are born too! It's just that they are tainted in the large bathtub called life after that!
Broken promises, regardless of how horrid transform into rage that stinks to the ocean floor. Through those bonds, we're drawn together countless times.

The crowd of people looks just like pixels in a picture to me. A single pixel is meaningless. But add two, three and four... They pile up rapidly until they ultimately form a picture. But I've never seen that picture.
A detective must become nothing more than an advocate. We must never put words to the feelings that failed to take form.

A normal detective eavesdrops, goes on stakeouts, and gathers information by foot to find out what they're looking for. But a NEET detective can search the world over to find the truth without stepping out of their room!

As of this moment, you're my official assistant. Your arms, your legs, your eyes, your ears, your throat, your nails, your teeth, and your tongue. Even the last drop of your blood. They all belong to me now.

Human emotions are ambiguous. A person can have contradicting feelings. I know how they are capable of creating lies and pain when reflected in the real world. That's why we have words. Words are brutally precise. They give form to feelings while mercilessly killing anything left unsaid.
I've been looking out at the world through windows I've opened across the net. It's an extremely close-minded and twisted world.
Most non-NEET people in the world don't realize that human nature isn't scalar, but vectorial.
NEET is not a stereotype. It's a way of life.

NEETs aren't people who can't do or won't do things. The only difference is the rules. Because we're playing with different rules, we're forced to do things differently. The participants are disoriented. They frown. Then they are discouraged by labeling and stereotyping and find comfort in isolation.
The human mind is uncertain things. Within mind, even contradictory thoughts may coexist.

There are only two professions in the whole world that give meaning to those who have died and what have been lost... They're writers and detectives. Writers are the only ones able to revive what was lost through their visions. Detectives are the only ones able to dig up the grave and bring back lost information. But the information us detectives dig up is nothing more than the truth as recorded in Heaven's Memo Pad.

True detective work is beyond the general masses. After all, we're advocates for the dead. We dig up what was lost to the grave and hurt the living to defend the honor of the dead. And we humiliate the dead to comfort the living.
We will never laugh at ourselves. Just as earthworms do not fear darkness and penguins are not ashamed of their inability to fly. That's the meaning of life, is it not?
What do you think killed the most people in history? It wasn't explosives or drugs. It was information. To know is to die.
What takes reason a hundred years to build a bridge to only takes the wings of faith a single night to reach.
Will you stay by my side? Will you watch as we uncover a harsh truth that was meant to remain buried, and share in the pain that comes with the act?

data.show: Kamisama To Unmei Kakumei No Paradox
data.quote: Our fates... can be changed. All we have to do is try.

No... this is wrong! Didn't I fall into hell? This can't be hell! Surrendering my body to the devil, I should have become a wrinkled hag! My hair should be full of hateful snakes, my skin should be the color of a vile frog's! And my blood should be burning with the jet black flames of my grudge..! A lie. This form, it's a lie! I've been tricked! I wanted to become a terrifying woman, one that just a look from, would send anyone running. I have to be such a woman! I don't want to forget my anger and hate!
Your darkness and hopelessness are like vapor. They're nothing more than shadows that shall melt away and disappear under the moon's light
In exchange of being able to get something that normal people can't have... you must let go of what normal people have.

Every dream has an end...No matter how nice the dream might be, or how scary it is. Under your warm blanket, the dream comes to an abrupt end, when mother shakes you awake. Forever and ever, the morning scene remains the same. But now I... I wonder... when the dreams began to never end.
In this world, there are things you’re better off not knowing.
The same melody repeats itself as the song grows richer and more beautiful. Wouldn't it be wonderful if we could live seemingly constant lives while experiencing changes bit by bit?
It would be enough for the depressing things in life to only exist in reality. It is because that I think the birth of a story is from people dreaming of a happy ending.
It's called a miracle because it doesn't happen.
Don't hesitate to tell the people you care about the feelings you have for them, because they may not be there tomorrow.
A rose will be born a rose. Different soil and water wouldn't change it into a different flower.
The human psyche goes out of whack so easily with minor elements, such as wall colors and staircase placement. Those who use them every day would be affected more dramatically.
Human beings are dangerous. If we're seen, we have to leave. My parents said so.
Sometimes you have to fight for the things that are worth fighting for.
[his parting words to Arrietty] My heart is stronger now, because you're in it.
When I saw you, I just wanted to find a way to protect you.

Our lives become a reality through the most meticulous calculations. Doing our best to continue living is a resolution ingrained in all of us. And this shapes the right future for us. You could say it is life’s greatest mystery. I want to observe the destination reached by the many lives that are created.
But the truth is merely the majority of the living. It only revolves around their choices and actions and nothing more.
Sorry, but I hate people who act innocent but are actually opportunists.
Choose the best thing you can do now, in order to get a step closer to your dream.
While it takes time to recover from the loss of a loved one, having an opportunity to take your mind off things helps too.
Looking at your own memories is recognizing the parts of you that you don't want to face.
By abandoning offense, even without winning, the result will be effectively victory.
Of course, if you lose in fighting it'd be a problem, but it's also a problem if you lose in character
I'm not a genuine idiot like you! I'm an idiot who accepts the fact that he's an idiot!
If you can no longer believe in the person you love, then test him until you are satisfied.
It is sky that allows the cloud to move about freely. But someday, I will even bite up the sky itself.
It's the sky...that allows the clouds to move about freely.
Pride is not something you can surrender.
Small animals have their own ways of surviving.

The word "discipline" is something that I would never give up, no matter what. But it's not because it is my pride that I will not give it up. It's because I cannot give it up, that's why it is my pride.
There is nothing less amusing than destroying those who have no will to live.
You cannot restrain me with logic.
A boss is someone who puts his life on the line for his subordinates.
If you run now, you will be running for the rest of your life.
The real me is super cool!
You came into my life as a story, you left as a legend.
[about Verde] His head is a bit off and he's a pervert scientist.
Hidden in truths lie lies, hidden in lies hides the truth.
I want Dr. Verde's intellect. In all honesty I wish he were just a brain and nothing more.
*To Lambo*  Smile... I said smile! Smile! Damn you!

Keep in mind that there are those who get hurt and those who try to heal the hurt ones. For those guys, it's not funny to have something they value so much be brushed off so lightly. How can a man protect another if he can't even protect himself?
Enjoy your life today. Yesterday is gone, and the tomorrow might never come.
It's not about what you should do, it's about what you want to do.
Rely on your Instinct, rather than Logic.

When you're really in trouble, of course I'd come and help.
That's what friends are for, right?
You won't know if you don't give it a try.
You won’t know if you don’t give it a try.
Be more confident despite your weaknesses and failures.
Hurting people won't help you regain your pride!

I consider everything that happened to be precious moments of my life. The pain. The suffering. The fun… And I am here right now, because everyone was there for me. I couldn't have accomplished anything by standing still, without anybody's help. I treasure every moment I have spent here. Unlucky? I feel pretty lucky. This is my resolve.
I don't know how to give up!!
If I were to lose a friend...then I couldn't die in peace!

You have already fulfilled my expectations. It appears that you’re still hiding a wealth of potential. I was watching you while your Guardians struggled to overcome their trials, and I could tell from your behavior and actions that you were always putting them first. And that didn’t change when Daemon set his trap. I witnessed your resolve to protect your Family, and I was impressed. Your Guardians also responded similarly. Sawada Tsunayoshi, I deem you worthy as boss of the tenth-generation Vongola Family
It's not an issue of what you should do, it's an issue of what you want to do.
I'm going to evaporate every molecule this scumbag is made out of!
Death is the end of everything. Your past and future will be lost in an instant where there will be no second chance. However as long as you live there will be a chance of pulling a win.
I'll always be by your side, just like the wind that flows through your hair.
When I want to do something, I do it, regardless of the rest of the world. When I don't, I don't, and that's that.

People are weak. Because of their weakness, they sometimes behave in ways devoid of self-respect. But then, so what if they do, my old friend? Even if I am struck with a thousand setbacks... it does not serve as a reason to alter the way I live... my life!

Step one foot outside, and with one pull of a trigger, you can inflict a fatal injury; with one push of a button, you can blow up a whole lot of people at once. The world truly is a cavalcade of efficiency in violence. Still... whether hacking each other with stone axes, cutting each other with swords, shooting each other with guns, cursing each other with magic, or taking aim at each other with missiles, for some reason, there's a craving that grips us, from which we can't evolve away.
You're not a coward. I know that because you haven't given up yet. You're standing here. As long as you face the light and take even one step, the human soul can never truly be defeated.
Once you get used to the abnormalities, they become mundane.
When things seem beyond help, if you open your eyes and take a really good look... It's a lot better than turning your back and hiding your eyes.

Don't you think it's futile to live in fear of death? I mean, everyone is going to die sometime, so is there any point in pretending not to see it for the present? Or instead, I wonder if they think it doesn't concern them, since they aren't going to die.
Even now, twenty centuries after the death of Christ, the world is a long way from peace.
Everyone dies eventually, whether they have power or not. That's why you need to think about what you'll accomplish while you're alive.

Death is a privilege of the living. A destiny without reason, continually roving on, evermore. How fleeting a thing it is. One cannot live and forget about death. The despair that is me, forgotten by death, can at least embrace my yearning at twilight, and sleep.

Everyone thinks at some point if what they are doing has any meaning or not. Will the day come when I get what's coming to me, or not? How much influence does my existence have on the world at all, or doesn't it?
Me? A liar? That's almost hurtful. I just don't feel like telling the whole truth.

You've always seen yourself as just a normal kid, and you're right, that's exactly what you are. You're normally caring, normally cheerful, and you're normally nosy. You've a strong moral compass, concern for your friends, and honor. I know you don't see this, but what's normal to you, well it's far from it. Everyone else would call it courageous and noble. It's because of the person you are that you don't think twice about your own safety when it comes to helping your friends. 'Cause that's just normal to you.

The world is not meant just to be looked at, it’s important to get the feel of things. Don’t be captivated just by what’s in front of you and neglect the rest. Free your mind from evil and accept everything as it is. This is what we call enlightenment.
Justice? Truth? More than anything else existing in this world, those things are a burden! The things that are needed are "acting" to deceive people and "power" to control others.
The moment between life and death is where a true man shows his color.

Well, everyone's unsure of their fighting abilities. When that happens, just train more! When you're afraid, just train! When something doesn't feel right, just train! When you don't believe in yourself anymore, just train! The only thing that won't betray you is your training.
You cannot go into battle believing you will lose.
For you I will go deeper than mountains, and higher than sea.
But I have a fear stronger than the fear of losing. It's the fear of boredom. I fear those days full of boredom.
In the end of that lonely path you are going, there is nothing.

When going on an adventure it's hard to stay calm. As humans, even if we know the adventure will be full of pain and sorrow, we still choose to go on it. Real adventures are not like the ones depicted in games or comic books - they're neither easy nor quick and they can break a person's heart. Real adventures can torment people. They can make you regret ever going on them. But still, that's the true meaning of an adventure. If that's so, then why do we, as people, choose to go on them? Why is that? Because we want to be heroes. Real heroes don't give up, even in front of pain or sorrow or regret! Rather, they want to live a full life. That's what real heroes are!
People can be so mean, no matter what you've done for them they will believe the first cheap rumor they hear. In the end they only care about themselves.
Life isn't about what can and can not be done, it's about doing it or not doing it!
Sometimes life is like jazz, and goes in an unexpected direction...
One who relies overly on a single skill will be brought low by that very same skill.
A castle that vanishes at the first gust of wind is worthless. A skyscraper within your mind will never fall down.
Fear is freedom! Subjugation is liberation! Contradiction is truth! These are the truths of this world! Surrender to those truths, you pigs who fawn over clothing!
I understand now. The world is not cut from the same cloth. It is because it is overflowing with inexplicable, unidentifiable things that the world is so beautiful.
Those who lack resolve are incapable of even wiping away their own tears.
Victory isn't determined solely by who has the superior physical abilities.
Blaming others isn't going to resolve anything. There'll be a lot of things that are injust throughout your life. You will have to stand up by yourself.
She was stolen away before I even realized I liked her.
So she knows how to smile.
Because we can’t understand each other, it makes us want to make things clear even more.
It was like you brought color to my life. You changed my life, all by yourself.
The longer you're with someone, the tougher it is to part ways.
There's no knowing how others are feeling unless you ask them. And your feelings can't get through to others unless you tell them directly.
There’s no knowing how others are feeling unless you ask them. And your feelings can’t get through to others unless you tell them directly.
When I told him my feelings, he understood. When I said I wasn't lying, he believed me.
If you can tell me what you want to say, tell me then. I want to hear it... Because no matter what you say, my feelings won't change.
If you're at a loss for words, you don't have to force yourself. That in itself is a form of comfort.
When you talk properly, you get your feelings across properly, right?
Aren’t we family? Aren’t I like your family too? So it’s okay to cry if you’re having a hard time. Then I’ll do anything to help.
I have to be her place to belong. I need to be a steady, reliable man whom she can trust.
The more exciting it was to meet, the sadder it feels to say goodbye, right?
As long as I can be with you, I dont care what anyone says or how much I’m detested. As long as I can be with the one I love, that alone makes it okay. That’s what I longed for.
As long as you do not give up, nothing is over.
Treasure the experience. Dreams fade away after you wake up.

If I suddenly showed up, would I bother him? Surprise him? There’s no way we could meet. But what if we did? What should I do? Would I annoy him? Would it be awkward? Or maybe… He’d be a bit glad to see me?
I wanted to tell you that… Wherever you may end up in this world, I will be searching for you.
Once in a while when I wake up, I find myself crying. The dream I must’ve had, I can never seem to recall...But the sensation that I’ve lost something lingers for a long time after I wake up.
Why does the scenery of a town that no longer exists wring my heart so?
I don't intentionally ignore anyone. Their words simply don't resonate with me.
I wouldn't learn German just to apologize, that would be too much work.
Whenever I see tulips, I'm always reminded of when we learned that these precious little flowers, have the strength to endure harsh winters.
Chizuru, you shouldn't be laughing too much. It was just a youthful indiscretion. Don't treat someone's first love like a mistake!

Now that the rainy season has started, it rains quite a lot. I don't like the rainy season. As the humidity rises, so does the misery. And recently, more things that contribute to my misery have sprung up around me...

I thought growing older would turn me into an adult. I believed I'd find work, get married, and become an adult. But none of those things have happened. Even though I've grown older, I feel like nothing's changed.
To protect themselves, human souls can merge fantasy with reality.

Every single one of them died while furiously giving off the light that resided within them and that light is then inherited by the next person where it will go on to shine with an even greater radiance. And thus people are connected together... allowing us to work towards a better tomorrow.

People fall into darkness because they have lost sight of the true nature of the light within them. Unable to find that light they flounder desperately while suffering in agony, only to give birth to tragedy. And there is no greater cause of tragedy, no greater source of darkness, than warfare.
People's lives don't belong to anyone. Anyone, except themselves. But people have a path. The path of how to use that life.

The purpose of an alliance is not simply for the sake of preventing an enemy from attacking you. Rather, importance lies in what one can obtain after the alliance. As well as your actions after the alliance.

Although my heart may be weak, it’s not alone. It’s grom with each new experience. And it’s found a home with all the friends I’ve made. I’ve become a part of their heart, just as they’ve become part of mine. And if they think of me now and then, if they don’t forget me, then our hearts will be one. I don’t need a weapon. My friends are my power!
It doesn’t matter how much we see each other, but how much we think of each other.
Memories, even important ones — don't come back to us whenever we want them to. But that doesn't mean the memories are gone.
The heart may be weak and sometimes it may even give in, but I've learned that deep down, there's a light that never goes out!

Thinking of you wherever you are. We pray for our sorrows to end, and hope that our hearts will blend. Now I will step forward to realize this wish. And who knows... starting a new journey may not be so hard, or maybe it has already begun. There are many worlds, but they share the same sky... one sky, one destiny.
The sounds you find pretty, and the sounds the other members find pretty... Are they really the same?

The world is constantly changing. And you can't expect it to stay the same, even for a second. If that's true, there's no need for you to go on a journey, Kino. Even if you stay in one place, you'll be able to keep experiencing the world.
Being able to forget things you want to forget, and being able to remember things you want to remember, is such a great thing, you know?
It's interesting, isn't it? The way that when someone expresses something, someone else always shows up to interpret it.
It's probably a lie. The reason why I only stay for three days in any country. I'm afraid I'll settle down, if I stay too long. Because if I settled down, I would cease to be a traveler.
Normal people don't become authors to begin with, Hermes.
The reason we hurt others is because we don't understand their pain.
The world is not beautiful; and that, in a way, lends it a sort of beauty.
The world is not beautiful. Therefore it is.
Whenever people see birds flying through the sky, it's said that they get the urge to go on a journey.

Classification of fantasy and reality is itself a fantasy that humans created... Life begins when you make a distinction between yourself and others. From that moment on, the world becomes a stage for the story in which you are the main character. All humans live in a fantasy in which they are the main character. But the world doesn't recognize you as the main character at all. What nonsense. Everyone lives their entire life tormented by this confusion. There's only one way out of this hell. To place yourself in a position that is neither the main character nor a supporting role. In other words, the author.
It's okay if you don't understand, just stay with me, watch me, and slowly come to understand.
If you don't know what state you wounds are in, of where you're hurting if you don't know that for yourself, there's no point in trying to share it with others, is there?

It's because we don't unterstand! It's because we don't unterstand that we wonder what the other is thinking and try desperately to unterstand every word they say... You end up thinking too much about the other person, and being close to them becomes painful so you try to distance yourself... I believe you become friends with somebody by doing that over and over, and that's how... As much as I hate to admit it, it's how I became friends with these guys.
There is nothing more expensive than something free.
The opposite of love isn't hate, it’s apathy.
Back then, if we could have have heard each other's voices, everything would have been so much better.

I intended to listen to your voice, but it really was nothing but intentions. It's pretty obvious, huh? Of course there's more going on than what people choose to tell you... But I convinced myself that was all there is to a person. I knew that, but still I interpreted the stuff I didn't understand about you in ways convenient for me... That's just how I am.

Things would have been so much better back then... If we had heard each other's voices. I hate myself. I was selfish, and I never thought about anyone else's feelings. Since then, my classmates have all looked down on me. I've lived for seventeen years, and I haven't lived one of them as a good person. The only time I heard your voice was when we got into that fight. And what pisses me off the most is the fact that I haven't changed at all since back then! But.,. But now, I think I can understand what you were saying... Nishimiya. Me and you... Can we be... friends? Shit!! I went way too far!! I was just gonna apologize and get out of here! Why the hell did I end up asking her to be friends?... Why did I even say that?! Jeez, that's so embarrassing! How can you even say that?
People struggle to find an answer even in things like math where there is clearly only one answer. So there's no shame in struggling through something that has no right answer.
People don't fall in love based on looks. And that's a scientific fact.

Even though you like someone already, your partner is decided for you... and you can't do anything about that crush. Because everyone keeps getting in the way... and saying you can't... But... when you're the one in love... the only thing that feels true... is that feeling.
Sometimes, I wonder why people fall in love. Why do we abandon ourselves... to these painful and burdensome feelings?

If you take someone at puberty, a teen... introduce him or her to a member of the opposite sex around the same age and say, "This is the person who was meant for you"... and then go on to spend a lot of time together... why wouldn't you fall for them?
I don't really want you to understand... I just don't want you to be like, 'Oh, is that all'? I don't need people to get it. These feelings... are important to me, and they're just for me.

Just your touch... gets me excited. It makes me so happy. But those feelings will all turn into pain. The happier I am now, the more it'll hurt. I know how cruel this is... but no matter how hard I try, I can't rid myself of this. Nejima-kun... I... don't know... what love is.

What is love?
Its when your eyes start following someone, and you look for them if they’re not around. You get excited thinking you might run into him when you’re putting your shoes on in the morning. And when you don’t it’s a little disappointing. But then you pass by him and that makes you happy for the rest of the day. It feels like you can handle anything. Seeing him is enough to make you happy.

On the internet, we only know each other's usernames. If we were talking face to face, I probably would never talk to them this way. They look at the "Real Me". They support me a lot... I wish there were more people like them.
Don’t forget that kindness can hurt people too.
If I show people how weak I am, they won't need me anymore.
Never forget that kindness can hurt instead of help.
There won't be any pain if you don't do anything stupid.
After spending most of my life trying to live as someone else wanted, I’d apparently forgotten who I was.

Even if I’m not perfect… Even if I’m not the ideal me… He says that I’m still my own person.
The point of life isn’t to be perfect.
It’s to do want you want to do, to be who you want to be.
That’s how I should be trying to live.
I am who I am now because of everything that's happened. If I try to deny my past, I'm denying the person I've become. I don't want to do that.
I am who I am now because of my past. Calling any choice I made a mistake would be calling who I am now a mistake.
I don't care what normal people do anymore. I'm going to live my life the way that I want to.
If I try to deny my past, I'm denying the person I've become. I don't want to do that.
If you were given the chance to redo your life, would you take it?

If you're lonely, you should say something! If you're worried, say something! Most people aren't as sharp as you are! If you want those people to understand you, you should say something! Even if you're worried that you'll embarrass yourself, you should still say something!
The point of life isn't to be perfect. It's to do what you want to do. To be who you want to be.
What are people? What is the "self"? So long as you look like someone else, no one can't tell who's really on the inside.
What defines humans... Defines us? Nobody will notice a change on the inside if you look the same on the outside.
You can never tell what'll happen next in life. But so long as you have faith in your feet, the road you walk will be a part of you.
You'll discover that problems have a way of working themselves out if you talk to your friends.
Everyone has different faces.
What you can't accomplish alone, becomes doable when you're with someone else.
When you're hiding a secret from the whole world, it puts a weight on your shoulders.
Don't tell people to disappear like it's nothing! Words can hurt people! You can't ever take them back! Even if you regret it, you can never take them back!
I'd talk, but... I fell into the habit of not saying what I really felt, somewhere along the way. And then I started believing that there wasn't anything... that I really wanted to tell anyone.
Well, singing, or music... I think by nature it was always meant to convey something. So if there's something you want to say, don't you think you should try singing it?

data.show: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo!
data.quote: I yearn for true gender equality. I have no patience for one who talks about female privilege when it suits them, and then complains about someone "not being a man" when it's convenient.

data.show: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo!
data.quote: Explosion!!!
It’s not that I’m a tolerant person. I just don’t want to think about these troublesome things.
Loneliness is peaceful, but there'll be no one to share happiness with.
There are a few things that people can't avoid while they live. People can't avoid misfortune. There are lots of hard things in life. There might even be times when you want to die.
This world is full of secrets meant never to be disturbed.
To climb a hill on a difficult road, you need to be walking steadily.
You only understand the true value of things after you've lost them.
That's interesting. Don't do it again.
The beauty of the stars never changes. However, stars that change are beautiful as well.
Today's my birthday. During times like these I always think whether or not it was a good thing that I was born.

data.show: Kore wa Zombie Desu ka? of the Dead
data.quote: Ah... Everything is such a bother. Even living.

data.show: Kore wa Zombie Desu ka? of the Dead
data.quote: You hide a tree by putting it in a forest; you hide a person among other people!
Words are shallow. Just talking doesn't bring world peace.
People who want to leave are going to leave. But not everyone is like that.
We humans are miserable creatures. We reject what we fear. We attack because we don' t understand. Human cowardice... breeds war.
What is important to survival isn't the ability to hide and protect yourself, it is to stand up and fight the Kabane.
Those who underestimate their enemies will not last long in this world.
Can we really be proud of our own survival that's predicated on sacrificing our own? There lives aren't all we lose.

Look. Look at me! Watch as the man you cast out spills his blood and dies. Take a nice long look! I will save you all. I want you to live the rest of your lives knowing the man you abandoned saved you. And I will laugh at you from the afterlife. And tell you that it serves you right!

Perhaps the souls of those we couldn't save, will eventually find their way to my sister. If they do, could they relay a message for me? That I promise to live for her too. And even if she feels a little lonely, just wait there for me for a little while longer.
We are weak Mumei. But, that doesn't mean we just roll over and accept our fate.
No, order exists to protect the people. We must not aim our guns at the wrong people. What we should eliminate are our doubting hearts and minds.
In romance, you tend to end up looking for someone who resembles you.
Every girl is born a princess, some of them just forget is all.
I do not allow anyone acting against me to look down upon me.
We cannot be satisfied until we have eliminated all others. It has nothing to do with reason. It is instinct.
What a laughable attempt. You should just stay where you are, groveling at my feet.

When I tell you to leave, leave. In this world, winning is everything. Winners are affirmed completely, and losers are denied completely. I've never lost at anything before, and I never will. Because I always win, and I'm always right. I show no mercy to those who oppose me, not even my own parents.
Winning is everything in this world. The victors write history. The losers are wiped from it.
Do you think everyone can make their dreams come true through hard work? Hard work isn't always rewarded.
I don't like practice. I just hate losing even more.
For a winner, there is nothing to say to a loser.
I won't say you'll definitely be able to do it if you don't give up. But if you do give up, then there'll definitely be nothing.
The only one who can beat me, is me!
“Your hard work will be rewarded.” What kind of idiot came up with that nonsense?
Don't go believing everyone with glasses is smart!
I'm going to teach you how to talk to your seniors, baldy.
Listen to your seniors once in a while or I will kill you.
If we have time to get upset, we should have used that time to move on… Even if just one step forward!
Once you look up to someone, you can't overtake them.

* The Zone * In this state of extreme focus, all unnecessary thoughts disappear and the athlete becomes absorbed in his play. Only those who have practiced and practiced earn the right to stand before the door, and it only opens unpredictably. It is the ultimate domain, open only to the chosen.

Human minds are not designed to accept negative statements like ‘don’t do this’ or ‘I can’t do that’, ‘we can’t make any mistakes’, ‘failure is not accepted’. These kinds of thoughts only serve to counter productively stress the body and lead to further mistakes. And if just one mistake is made, it turns into a vicious cycle. The more they think about it, the more mistakes will be made, and the more the quality of their plays will drop.
No matter how hard you practice, "someday" and "maybe" aren't good enough. I need to know if you have ambitious goals and the will to accomplish them.
There is no meaning to victory, if you win alone.
Break them and they're all just trash.
A man who cannot play by himself, cannot improve by himself.
Don't give up! There's no shame in falling down! True shame is to not stand up again!
Don’t give up! There’s no shame in falling down! True shame is to not stand up again!
Don’t you know the saying ‘Man proposes; God disposes’ ? First, you do your best and then fate will decide how it will turn out.
How you change is up to you.

In the world of sports, quickness doesn't necessarily mean having the fastest time. It could also mean the acceleration from zero to maximum speed or the deceleration from maximum speed to zero. This is known as agility.
The only lucky item you'll need is already within - CONFIDENCE.

It's not about doing what it takes to win. Sei-chan told me before "Winning is just like breathing". Victory isn't something that Sei-chan seeks. It's a natural part of his life. It's a basic bodily function.
When one thing ends, another begins.
Does math bring out your wrath?
Fear isn't a bad thing. There are some things that can only be done by cowards.
Be Yourself because an Original is worth more than a Copy
If we understood how other people felt, then nobody would ever start wars!
It’s not the time to be scared. Of course it’s better if the opponent is strong rather than weak, right!
Life is all about challenges, There's no point in living if there's no one strong to play with, It's better if I can't win.
The only times we're fated to lose are in fictional stories. This is our drama! We decide what the plot will be!
There's no such thing as useless effort.
This is our show. We're the ones who are writing the script.
With out strong opponents, living isn't fun. It's perfect if I can't win.
You'll always stand by the light. That is your basketball.
What are you good at, what do you like… You need to show something that makes people understand who you are.
For living creatures, Victory if Life, and Defeat means Death.
If you wanna climb a mountain, you obviously aim for the top, but you gotta enjoy the scenery too.
Team isn't just something to be protected. A team also protects you. We don't support each because we are a team. We are a team because we support each other.

They say some defeats are meaningful and losing makes you stronger. Do you understand what that means? For living creatures victory is life, and defeat means death. It's an extreme example, but humans retain that instinct. Those who know the terror of defeat, hunger for victory.
You keep working HARD in order to win and you get better little by little. To IMMERSE yourself in something you like, that's what it means to enjoy something fully.
But hating something you love is a painful feeling.
Celebrations are more fun if there are more people.
Even if other people think it’s meaningless, it’s disgusting for me to quit, even when the possibility is 0. Therefore, I will never... Give up !

I am a supporting actor, a shadow. But a shadow will become darker if the light is stronger and it will make the white of the light stand out. As the shadow of the main actor, I will make you, the light, the number one in Japan.
I am the shadow that has overcome the light.
If there's no one happy, is it really a victory?
If we give our best in something we love, we'll enjoy the victories from the bottom of our hearts.
If you haven't changed, that means you haven't improved.
No matter how many more points you have at the end of the game, if you're not happy, that's not a victory.
No one knows what the right decision, to make in life, is, and that is not why I made this choice.
So long as I don't give up, the possibility of winning will never fall to zero.
The past and the future are not the same, but they're not completely separate either.
The stronger the light, the darker the shadow.
There’s no meaning if you win alone!
We'll worry about the future once we get there.
When you come to hate something you liked it is incredibly painful.
