The pressure is worse if the reptile becomes a bird, and even worse when the bird becomes a mammal. The higher up the chain we move towards the more advanced creatures, the more we hate to kill them. And eventually we hit a hurdle too high to overcome. We're unable to kill anything beyond that point. I think the highest hurdle would be... people.
Time's a-wastin' people, let's go!
You can steal the very last bite of my very best food. You can mock me all you want. But if you insult my best friend, I will obliterate you.
[talking about food] The last bite. It is the final one, and the most suitable one to enjoy the most. No matter what it costs, I will not give it up.
[When Ino visits him in the hospital] Hehe. I'm also the type that gets girls to visit him. Take that, Shikamaru!
Chubbies rule!
I'm not fat, I'm pleasingly plump!
This punch is heavier than life itself!
Bitter crimson tears flow from lifeless eyes, and mingle with the endless sands... Bestowing ever greater power upon the demon god.
BLOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOD!!! MY BLOOOOOOOOOOOOOD!!!
Family? Let me tell you what kind of link I have with them. They are just lumps of meat linked by hatred and murderous intent!
I took the life of the woman I was supposed to call mother in the process of being born... in order to become the world's strongest shinobi... I became the incarnation of sand...
If love is just a word, then why does it hurt so much if you realize it isn't there?
In order to escape a road of solitude, one has to work hard, and forge a new path with their own power.
It's too bad I don't think of you as anything. If you get in my way... I'll kill you.
Just because someone is important to you, it doesn't necessarily mean that, that person is good. Even if you knew that person was evil... People cannot win against their loneliness.

Naruto... Just so you know, there will be a war to protect the Eight-Tails and Nine-Tails. In other words - you. For the sake of the ninja world and as the Kazekage, I will guard you with my life. If as a member of Akatsuki, Sasuke Uchiha stands in the way of the ninja coalition... I will show him no mercy.

Now there's something I understand a little better. Hate, sadness, even joy. To be able to share it with another person... Naruto Uzumaki. From fighting him I learned that. He knew pain like I did and then he taught me that you can change your path. I wish that one day I can be needed by someone. Not as a frightening weapon... But as the sand's Kazekage.
One day I'd like to become something precious to others.
Peace under an illusion is not true peace. It's only meaningful if the real world manages to accomplish it.
People cannot win against their loneliness.

Three times now... We've fought world wars for our own nations, our own villages. We've hurt one another. We've hated one another. That hatred bred a lust for power, and that lust for power created ME. I was a Jinchuuriki, the embodiment of hatred and power. And I hated this world, and all the people in it... I wanted to destroy it with my own hands. The exact same thing Akatsuki is trying to do today. But one man, one ninja from Konoha stopped me. I was his enemy, yet he wept for me! I hurt him, yet he called me his friend! He saved me! My enemy, my fellow Jinchuuriki... He suffered the same pain as me, yet bore no ill will! There are no enemies here because we've all suffered at Akatsuki's hand! SO THERE IS NO SAND, NO STONE, NO LEAF, NO MIST, NO CLOUD! THERE ARE ONLY SHINOBI! And if you still hold a grudge against the Sand, then when this war is over, come and take my head instead! Our enemies are after the friend who saved my life! If they take him, if we hand him over, our world is finished! I want to protect him, and I want to protect our world! But I'm too young to protect it all on my own! All of you lend me your aid!
We have walked through the darkness of this world, that’s why we are able to see even a sliver of light.
You can make a rain of 1,000 needles. I will make it rain blood.
What's your wish? Peace? Money? Or the world? Whatever you wish for, it's something you have to get with your own strength!
When captured birds grow wiser, they try to open the cage with their beaks. They don't give up, because they want to fly again.
{TO NARUTO} Oh, by the way... I'm a boy
Can you understand? Not having a dream... not being needed by anyone... The pain of merely being alive.
I am of no more use as his tool. Please, kill me.
I want to make his dreams come true...
I'm sure that the boy I killed, who shared that skill, must also have grown up knowing the pain of which I speak. We are special. We are powerful. And we are feared.
Is there... somebody precious to you?
It is only through the eyes of others that our lives have any meaning.

Often people have it wrong, mistakenly believing... that showing mercy to an enemy is kindness. They spare the foe whose life is in their hands. But don't you see? It's an empty existence, to go on living... alone and unloved... when defeat's already cost you your dream!

Often people have it wrong, mistakenly believing...that showing mercy to an enemy is kindness. They spare the foe whose life is in their hands... But don't you see? It's an empty existence... to go on living... alone and unloved... when defeat's already cost you your dream!
That is when I realized that in all of the world no one needed me. I was alone.
[thinking] If I'm still sane by the time I finish their training it'll be a miracle!
A ninja must see underneath the underneath.
Behind this mask is...Another mask! Pretty cool, huh?

Forget about revenge. The fate of those who seek revenge is grim. It's tragic, You will end up suffering and hurting yourself even more. Even if you do succeed in getting revenge, the only thing that remains is emptiness.
Gai...what I said earlier...I was out of line. I was being a self-righteous fool. I realize now that if I'd been in your shoes, I probably couldn't have stopped him, either.
Hmmm...how do I put this? My first impression of this group...you're a bunch of idiots!
I don't know what this boy means to you, Gai, but I shouldn't have to tell you that we never bring our personal feelings into play. I didn't think you were capable of it.

I really am... shinobi trash. But the one thing I still learned is this. That void is something that everyone helps you fill. Just because you face adversity and hardships, is no reason to give up on this world. A person willing to throw away all those memories... of their friends and comrades, will never find peace of mind. Resorting to something like that isn't going to bury that hole. If you persevere and endure, someone will be there to support you!
I will show you my own move.
I'm Hatake Kakashi. Things I like and things I hate? I don't feel like telling you that. My dreams for the future? Never really thought about that. As for my hobbies... I have lots of hobbies.

I've been around longer than you have, kid. And I've seen my share of troubles. You're not the only one who knows what it's like to lose somebody. It looks like neither of us has led a charming life, have we? Still, it's not that bad. At least you and I have been lucky enough to find new comrades to help fill the void.

I've lived longer than you. And times have been bad. I know the pain of loss. You and I haven't really been fortunate. It's true. But it could be worse. For me, and for you, too... We've found good friends, haven't we? Because of your losses, you should understand.
If comrades that you trust gather around you, hope can take physical form and become visible. That`s what I believe...
In society, those who don't have many abilities, tend to complain more.

In the shinobi world, those that break the written and unwritten rules are deemed trash... but be that as it may... Those that would desregard their comrades so easily are even worse than trash. And those who don't have the decency to respect the memories of their comrades are the worst.
Leaf Village Secret-Finger Justu...1,000 Years of Death!!! *sticks his fingers up Naruto's ass*
Some people want power and they get mad when they don't get it. They take their fury out on everyone else. You don't want it, it becomes you.
Sorry I'm late guys, a black cat crossed my path so I had to go the long way.
Sorry I'm late. You wouldn't believe the traffic.

The hole in one's heart gets filled by others around you. Friends won't flock to someone who abandons the memory of his friends and gives up on the world just because things don't go the way he wants them to. That won't help fill the hole in your heart. And people won't help those who run away and do nothing. As long as you don't give up, there will always be salvation.
It doesn't matter what you do, if you live and die as you like. However, no matter what road you end up taking, remember to protect the people that are precious to you.
Billboard brow!!!
I believe you have the potential to bloom into something even more beautiful than the cosmos.
Oh, I'm sorry. Her head's so empty, so I mistook her for a vase and put flowers in her. You might want to spit that out quick, though. Those can be quite poisonous.
[About Naruto] Well that's typical. Not happy unless he's giving people a heart attack.

[as a child] Why should I be sad?! My parents died protecting the village from the monster fox. They're heroes, and I'm the son of those heroes! If I cry, it's because I'm happy! I'm not even sad that they went and left me all alone...
[when Naruto transforms into a woman in front of the whole class] CUT THE STUPID TRICKS! THIS IS YOUR LAST WARNING!!
I hate the fox, but the boy - I don't hate the boy.

It seems like the small leaves in the Village of Konoha have inherited that "will of fire" you spoke of, Third. The fire on the leaves will eventually burn greater and stronger... It will flash its light and protect this village.

When a person dies, he disappears, along with his past, current lifestyle, and his future. Many people die in missions and wars. They die easily and in surprisingly simple ways. Hayate was one of them. Those who die have goals and dreams. But everyone has something as important as those. Parents, siblings, friends, lovers... people who are important to you. They trust and help each other. The bond between the people important to you ever since birth and the string that binds them becomes thicker and stronger as time goes by... It's beyond reason. Those bound to you by that string will do that because it is important.
Any technique is worthless before my eyes.
Even the strongest of opponents always has a weakness.
He who forgives and acknowledges himself... that is what it truly means to be strong!

I always lied to you telling you to forgive me. I used these hands to keep you at distance... I did not want you to get involved. But now... I think you could have changed father and mother. Perhaps even the entire Uchiha. If I would have stood in front of you and looked you in the eyes from the very beginning... talked to you instead of down to you... and been open about everything. But I failed, and speaking to you now, like this, isn't going to undo the permanent damage that's already been done to you. That's why I wanted to show you the truth. Even if it's just a little. And no matter what you decide to do from here on out, you never have to forgive me - I will always love you.

I'll admit that you're stronger than before. But because of that, you seem to have lost sight of what's truly important. Now listen carefully. The people of the village, who once abhorred you, have begun to admire you. They think of you as a comrade. It's because you fought hard for their acceptance. You once said it was everyone who cares about you who helped you get where you are now. If you forget others because you have power, and become arrogant and egotistical, you'll eventually become just like Madara. No matter how powerful you become, do not try to shoulder everything alone. Becoming the Hokage doesn't mean people will acknowledge you. But when the people acknowledge you, you can become Hokage. Never forget your friends!
It is not wise to judge others based on your own preconceptions and by their appearances.
It's never been "The one who becomes Hokage will be acknowledge by everyone", it's "The one who is acknowledge by everyone, becomes the Hokage".

Kabuto: Isn't acknowledging what you can't do the same as giving up?

Itachi: No, it means to forgive yourself for what you aren't able to do. Your comrades are there to make up for what you cannot do and to prevent you from ignoring things that you actually might have been able to do.

No single thing is perfect by itself. That's why we're born to attract other things to make up for what we lack. I think we start walking in the right direction only after we start getting our counterparts beside us.
Now I feel that maybe knowing who I actually am is the key to reach perfection. Because that means knowing what I can and cannot do.
People's lives don't end when they die. It ends when they lose faith.
Self-sacrifice... A nameless shinobi who protects peace within its shadow. That is a true shinobi.
Teachings that do not speak of pain have no meaning, for humankind cannot gain anything in return.
The ones who aren't able to acknowledge their own selves are bound to fail.
The village does have its dark side and its inconsistencies, but I'm still Konoha's Itachi Uchiha.
Those who cannot acknowledge themselves, will eventually fail.
Those who forgive themselves, and are able to accept their true nature... They are the strong ones!
True Change cannot be made if it is bound by laws and limitations, predictions and imagination.
A person grows up when he's able to overcome hardships. Protection is important, but there are some things that a person must learn on his own.
A place where someone still thinks about you is a place you can call home.
All the girls in Konoha are so hot these days.
Getting dumped always makes a man stronger. But then again, men aren't meant to pursue happiness.
Knowing what it feels to be in pain, is exactly why we try to be kind to others.
Rejection is a part of any man’s life. If you can’t accept and move past rejection, or at least use it as writing material - you’re not a real man.
Rejection makes a man stronger.
I don't know which is more pathetic; the fool, or those who follow him.
[about the inefficacy of his attack against Tsunade] Did it not penetrate deep enough because of her fat breasts?
Mm, she's strong and scary. I bet she's single.
The more you want something, the harder it is to wait for it.

[Thinking] What a sucker. He doesn't know I can re-establish control over my puppet within a blink of an eye. It's what makes me an expert puppet master. And so what if Crow's body is out of commission? I don't need his body. Every part of him is a lethal weapon. [To Shino] Looks like you underestimated me, bug boy. For the last time! There's enough poison on that to drop an elephant, so you're dead.
A fair warning... we ninja of the Sand aren't as easygoing as those of the Leaf. But getting close to Kuroari so carelessly...isn't good!
But I want to play around before some noisy people come!
You tick me off. I hate short people anyway. And you're so impertinent for someone younger than me. It makes me want to break you.
A wall's a wall and there's no wall I can't punch a hole through!

Akamaru, what's wrong boy? Have you forgotten my scent? We've always been together haven't we? We grew up together. Akamaru please, somewhere in there, there has to be a part of you that remembers. Show me that you remember. AKAMARU! Forgive me. Can you? I know that I've brought you nothing but pain and suffering. I broke my word. I swore I'd always protect you. Akamaru I'm sorry. Sorry I wasn't a better master. I'm here. Here for you. Forever.
Hinata, untie the ropes before you faint.
I called you an idiot, idiot!
I must be a pretty pathetic owner for you to have bitten me, Akamaru....
It's not bad enough they buried us alive in the oversized dung heap, but now they're stealing our chakra. You gotta give these guys credit for thoroughness!
[after Naruto does his Shadow Clone Jutsu] Oh, there sure is a lot of garbage scattered around here. But, trash is just trash after all. It simply needs to be cleaned up.
[to the Sound Ninja Four] Which do you prefer? To die, or to obey?
*referring to Orochimaru* I am not his pawn..! He is the one, the only one who ever gave my life meaning!! But how could the likes of you EVER UNDERSTAND THAT?!?
Against the power of will I posses... The capability of my body is nothing.

Humans... Do humans have a purpose when they are born? I have been wondering recently. Because they are born, do they have an important duty? The meaning of being born... For humans to find that answer... It is the one freedom God gave them.
I don't hate the darkness. It was IN the darkness that I was raised.
I see...since I am no longer going to be Lord Orochimaru's vessel, my duty is to protect the vessel.
I will see the truth of this world... LORD OROCHIMARU WILL SHOW ME!!!

I've been wondering... There must be a purpose for people being born into this world. Why are we here? What does it mean? I've been thinking about it a lot lately. I realized that finding our purpose IS the meaning. That's why we're here. And the ones who find it... They're the only ones who are truly free.
If Tayuya comes back, I'll kill her.
Is there really a god? If there is one, why does he keep me confined in here?
Lets see, how should I kill you?
You've only seen one of my dances.
[after learning Guy Sensei's name. Might Guy] Yeah, mighty stupid looking guy!
Hmhmhmhm, I think I will play with you a bit before killing you!
Hmm... Itachi... it would be annoying if he moved around a lot. Perhaps we should cut off a leg or two?
I'll enjoy shaving you to death.
Konoha's Uchiha clan and the Mist's Seven Shinobi-gatana seem petty before his name.
....Would you consider dying together "Teamwork" as well?
Don't improvise what you cannot handle.

In this world, wherever there is light - there are also shadows. As long as the concept of winners exists, there must also be losers. The selfish desire of wanting to maintain peace causes wars, and hatred is born to protect love.

Man seeks peace, yet at the same time yearning for war... Those are the two realms belonging solely to man. Thinking of peace whilst spilling blood is something that only humans could do. They're two sides of the same coin... to protect something... another must be sacrificed.

Nine-Tails, you are merely a momentary life, a temporary existence of coalesced energy... energy that once was a single, ultimate form! An unstable force, lacking in intelligence or sapience, you require a guide to show you purpose. That guide is the Uchiha! The tailed beasts are but slaves to those with blessed eyes. Obey!
Power is not will, it is the phenomenon of physically making things happen.
Talking about peace whilst spilling blood, it's something that only humans can do.
Wake up to reality! Nothing ever goes as planned in this world. The longer you live, the more you realize that in this reality only pain, suffering and futility exist.
DYNAMIC ENTRY!
If you want to be free from your suffering, make up your mind. If you give up on your dream, you will suffer more.
You're right, all efforts are pointless... If you don't believe in yourself.
If you don't share someone's pain. You can never understand them.
War brings death. And wounds and pain to both sides. There's nothing harder to accept, than the deaths of those you love. So you believe they could never die. Especially those who haven't known war.

*To himself, while fighting Temari* Oh man... those clouds are so lucky. so free. More to the point, I didn't feel like doing this in the first place. And I only became a ninja because I thought life would've been more interesting as one... I suppose things aren't gonna be that simple.
*To Tayuya* How many times do I have to tell you? The first move is always a feint. It's the most basic thing, to land a hit with the second move.
*To Temari* It really doesn't matter to me if I ever become a chūnin or not, but I guess I shouldn't let myself be beaten by a female, so let's do it.
He turned a room full of strangers into a room full of enemies with just one sentence.
I could say I'm not sad, but I'd be lying. The problem is the world won't let me stay a kid forever, so I can't lie around crying about it either.
In life, nothing good comes out of hurrying.
It's not because I'm lazy, it's just because I don't care.
It's stupid to talk about things you're not. Be yourself and you'll be fine.
It’s because we help out when they’re in trouble that we can count on them to come running when we need it.
Laziness is the mother of all bad habits. But ultimately she is a mother and we should respect her.

Regardless of our limitations, we can always be of some use. Our power may seem insignificant... but it may just prove to be useful in the grand scheme of things. Stay focused. Never avert your eyes, because if an opening arises, even our insignificant power may be enough to determine the fate of the world. Which is why everyone must stay alert and ready to strike at any moment!

Someday, I just want to marry a regular girl who isn't too ugly and not too pretty. Have two children, first a girl, then a boy. Retire after my daughter is married and my son becomes a successful ninja, and spend the rest of my life playing shōgi or Go. Then die of old age before my wife.
There's no advantage to hurrying through life.
Because they saved me from myself, they rescued me from my loneliness. They were the first to accept me for who I am. They're my friends.

Don't underestimate me! I don't quit and I don't run! You can act tough all you want! You're not gonna scare me off! No way! I don't care if I DO get stuck as a Genin for the rest of my life! I'll still be Hokage someday!
Failing doesn't give you a reason to give up as long as you believe.
Hard work is worthless for those that don't believe in themselves.
I will become a bigger badass than my father. And a stronger shinobi than my mother!
I'm the only one who can bear the full brunt of your hate! It's my job, no one else's! I'll bear the burden of your hatred... and we'll die together!
If the father's responsibility is to protect the child... then my responsibility is to exceed the father.
If we fight again... We're both gonna die.
If you don't like the hand that fate's dealt you with, fight for a new one!
If you don't like your destiny, don't accept it. Instead, have the courage to change it the way you want it to be!
It's not the face that makes someone a monster, it's the choices they make with their lives.
Listen to yourself whining and complaining like some sorry little victim! You can whimper all day for all I care, you're nothing but a coward!
My power isn't the Rasengan or Sage Jutsu or the Nine Tails chakra. My power is right here. [points to the center of his chest]
Once you question your own belief, it's over.
People who continue to put their lives on the line to defend their faith become heroes and continue to exist on in legend.
Sakura-chan, you sure do love Sasuke, don't you?

Sasuke, I always knew you were alone. In the beginning I was glad because I thought you were like me - I wanted to talk to you! But you... didn't speak. You always had everyone watching you. You could do everything and we were too different. So I decided that you would become my rival. I didn't want to lose because I was called a loser all the time. Even when we became Team 7, I still thought this way. I always tried to lie but... but the truth is... I always wanted to be like you. I aspired to be like you. Because of that... I was glad that you wanted to fight me.
Sasuke! Sasuke! Sasuke! What does he have that I don't have?!
So shut up about "destiny" and...how people can't change! 'Cause... unlike me... you're not a "failure".
The pain of being alone is completely out of this world, isn't it? I don't know why, but I understand your feelings so much, it actually hurts.
To become Hokage is my dream!
When I'm with Iruka-sensei, I think if that's what having a father is like... *to Sasuke* When I'm with you, I think if that's what having a brother is like.
When people are protecting something truly special to them, they truly can become... as strong as they can be.
When people have different opinions, you should apply the majority vote.
When you give up, your dreams and everything else, they're gone.
While you're alive, you need a reason for your existence. Being unable to find one is the same as being dead.
[To Hinata At Chuunin Exams] So you're not going to withdraw? Then don't blame me for what happens to you.
Fear. That is what we live with. And we live it everyday. Only in death are we free of it.

Hinata... this is the unalterable difference in strength... the distinction that separates the elite from the failure. This is the unchangeable reality. From the moment you said you wouldn't run, your defeat was inevitable. The only possible outcome was your present despair... Withdraw!
People share only one common fate... death.
The difference between stupidity and genius, is that genius has its limits.
I'm no one. I don't want to be anyone. All I care about is completing the moon's eye plan. This world is completely worthless. There is nothing left in it but misery.
No one cared who I was until I put on a mask.

Somewhere inside of me?! Take a good look, there's nothing inside of me anymore!!! I don't feel pain, I don't feel anything! You need to let that guilt go Kakashi. This wind hole wasn't your doing... It was made by this evil, cruel world.
It's because I've experienced pain in the past, that I can even consider what would be best for the future!
Never give up without even trying. Do what you can, no matter how small the effect it may have!

[To Sarutobi] What nonsense! In the grand scheme of time, you're nothing more than a trivial footnote in the brief history of a cluster of huts called the "Leaf Village"! In time, the Hokage Stone Faces will crumble and be worn down to nothing...
Darkness. When everything that you know and love is taken away from you so harshly. All you can think about is anger, hatred and even revenge. And no one can save you.
Either people change or they die before they do. It's one or the other.
It's human nature not to realize the true value of something, unless they lose it.
Maybe, just maybe, there is no purpose in life... but if you linger a while longer in this world, you might discover something of value in it.
Real power is forged from the desire smoldering in the heart. It fans into a flame and begins to burn with an intensity scarcely imagined to be possible.
There probably isn't any meaning in life. Perhaps you can find something interesting to do while you are alive. Like how you found that flower. Like how I found you.
True power is forged from the desire smoldering in the heart, it fans into a flame and begins to burn with an intensity one scarcely imagines to be possible...
Because of the existence of love - sacrifice is born. As well as hate. Then one comprehends... one knows PAIN.
Do you understand pain a little now? If you don't share someone's pain, you can never understand them. But just because you understand them doesn't mean you can come to an agreement. That's the truth
Even children are forced to grow up in the face of pain.
Even the most ignorant, innocent child will eventually grow up as they learn what true pain is. It affects what they say, what they think… and they become real people.

How can you say that you will never change? That you will not change, no matter how great the pain you face? Can you continue believing in yourself forever? Can you guarantee it? Can you have such faith in yourself?!
Human nature pursues strife.

Just by living, people hurt others without even realizing it. So long as humanity exists, hate will also exist. There is no peace in this cursed world. War is just a crime paid for by the pain of the defeated...
Justice comes from vengeance, but that justice only breeds more vengeance.
Love breeds sacrifice... which in turn breeds hatred. Then you can know pain.

Love is the reason why there is pain. When we lose someone precious to us, hate is born. Vengeance is the product of that hate and so death follows. But in death there is only more death. This will give rise to more pains. In this cursed world we live in, it is a cycle of hatred that will not cease. You and I seek the same thing that Jiraiya-sensei wanted. Let me ask you this: How will you confront this hatred in order to create peace?
Pain is the way to bring peace.

People are stupid. If I don't do this, there will be no peace. Eventually, time will pass and the pain will heal. Eventually, checkmate's power will weaken and people will begin fighting again. This time, they will use the weapon themselves and once more know true pain. And for the short time, peace will come again. It will give birth to short period of peace within this endless chain of hatred. That's my wish.
Religion, ideology, resources, land, spite, love or just because. No matter how pathetic the reason, it's enough to start a war.
Sometimes you must hurt in order to know, fall in order to grow, lose in order to gain because life's greatest lessons are learned through pain.

We are but men, drawn to act in the name of revenge that we deem to be justice. But... if there is justice in revenge then that same justice will breed only more revenge... and trigger a cycle of hatred.

You think you're the only ones who matter. You think you can put off death. But that peace made you foolish and thoughtless. If you kill someone, someone else will kill you... this hatred binds us together.
If you believe in your dreams, I will prove to you, that you can achieve your dreams just by working hard.
My motto is to be stronger than yesterday, if I have to I'll be stronger than half a day ago, even a minute ago!
Stop it! How dare you disrespect an opponent that fought you with all he had!?
A smile is the best way to get oneself out of a tight spot, even if it is a fake one. Surprisingly enough, everyone takes it at face value.

It's because Sakura loves Sasuke that she doesn't want him to sink any lower. It's because she loves him that she wants to rescue him from the evil path he currently walks. Even if the only way to do it is to kill him with her own two hands, I believe, she's prepared to do it because she loves him.
The best way to escape reality without running is smiling even if it is obviously fake.
Every one of us must do what's in their power! If we're going to die anyway, then it's better to die fighting than to do nothing!
It's always like this. The only things I can ever do for Naruto are the little things anyone could do...
The things that are most important aren't written in books. You have to learn them by experiencing them yourself.
True beauty lies in things that last forever, never rotting or fading.
What's the point of something that disappears as soon as it's born?
I have told you before, I'm an avenger. I don't care about this test, Chunin or whatever. 'Am I strong?' that's the answer I want.
I understand now. Even if I must take the devil's fruit, I must gain power. I am an avenger.
Tears and rain, fall down on my face, my body is unable to stay yet my heart is unwilling to leave.
Legends from the distant past are always exaggerated, but eventually, someone outdoes them... that's when new legends are born!
Emotion leads one to hate... and hate leads one to conflict and war.
Trying to improve by learning from others that is what calls friendship.
The weaker you are the louder you bark.
It's too late to regret. Reality is just cruelly moving forward.
Not one wish ever gets granted in this world.
Grown-ups are idiots. If they really want to bring an end to this endless fighting, they need to sit down with one another and reach a truce.
People become stronger because they have things they cannot forget. That's what you call growth.
A wound of a heart is different from a flesh wound. Unlike a flesh wound, there are no ointments to heal it, and there are times when they never heal.
Love is... care and devotion you feel for the precious ones around you.

Physical wounds will definitely bleed and may look painful 
but over time they heal by themselves and if you apply medicine, 
they will heal faster. What's troublesome are wounds of the heart. Nothing is harder to heal. They're a bit different from physical injuries. You can't apply medicine for one thing and sometimes, they never heal. There's only one cure for a wound of the heart. 
It's a bit bothersome and you can only receive it from someone else. What is it? Love.
His soul was as pure as snow.
The past does not exist to remind us that the future cannot be changed. It exists to remind us what the future can be.

I actually don't think something like perfection exists. That is I think why we are born able to absorb things... and by comparing ourselves with something else we can finally head in a good direction.
In this moment, I am euphoric. Not because of any phony Shinobi's blessing. But because, I'm enlightened by my intelligence.
Knowledge and awareness are vague, and perhaps better called illusions. Everyone lives within their own subjective interpretation.
[Last words to Hashirama] As comrades, huh... well... if that's how... we... will.... *smiles*
I'd be lying if I said things are going according to my plan... but beggars can't be choosers, right?
It seems that you still want to dance but... You will not be able to make steps anymore.
Love is not necessary, power is the only true necessity.
The longer you live... The more you realize that reality is just made of pain, suffering and emptiness...

There is no telling what kind of pain will come  after me, but... if I stop believing because of that, if the hero should change, it'll turn into another story from the one my master left behind. Then it wont be Naruto! I can't write novels like my master did. That's why the sequel has to come from the life I live no matter how great the pain, I'll continue walking because that's who Naruto is!
Feel pain, think about pain, accept pain, know pain... Shinra Tensei!
Learn to embrace the fear of feeling about what it's like to contemplate what it is to know true pain. Because when I had nothing and no one - I always had Pain.
Even if I force myself to smile. It seems I'm the type of person who ends up being hated.
(About Sakura) Was she having fun in her little make-believe fantasy of true love? As for me, I have absolutely no reason to love her and likewise, I can see no reason why she would love me.

People are weak. They have no fangs or claws. All they can do is cry. And yet, how was it that this world came into the possession of humans? That's because...  among all living things... they are... the cruelest!
People cannot show each other their true feelings. Fear, suspicion, and resentment never subside.
It's not always possible to do what we want to do, but it's important to believe in something before you actually do it.
The moment people come to know love, they run the risk of carrying hate.
Even innocent foolish children will grow up in the face of pain, until their thoughts and beliefs are the same as their doubts.
Having too many bonds causes one to lose focus, weakening their strongest wish, their greatest desire.
No man chooses evil because it is evil; he only mistakes it for happiness, the good he seeks
Was he the kind of master who would leave you behind? If you decided in your hearts to serve him, then believe in your master.
Don't lie if you don't have to.
When you go easy on the ones with just a bit of power, they give you more trouble than anybody else.
I may not have anywhere to go... but I can't just selfishly disappear either.
No one could understand the fear of walking alone in this unstable world.

There were a lot of people who were kind to begin with. No, they were probably good people but, I don't want to see the disappointment in their eyes anymore. I don't really want to meet kind of people anymore.

We probably are.  I can't explain it very well, but it seems that lately it doesn't matter, human or spirit.  If your hearts touch, it's the same thing.  When you're all alone, you get lonely, and the first step is always scary.
As I had encountered kindness, I wanted to be kind myself. I wanted to be able to do something, just like others had done for me.
Even if it's small, take a step forward.
Even if there's nothing here today, there might be something tomorrow.  It's a caring heart that's important.

Hotaru, do you think the day will come that I'll lose it (the ability to see spirits) as well?  A one-sided visit and troublesome days...is that freedom? or...At that time, a small firefly (Hotaru) passed by and whispered something to me.  But I could not understand the words of a bug.  Farewell, Hotaru.  I wonder if that person understood...just that person.

I called his name again and again. And I learned that each time, nothing called back. I learned that no matter how much you want something, how many times you scream to it, sometimes it's out of reach. I decided to stop calling out for someone who would never call back.
I decided to stop calling out for someone who would never call back.
I don't have much power and I'm trying to get stronger. But I'm not afraid of sharing my heart...
I learned that no matter how much you want something, no matter how much you scream for it, sometimes it's out of your reach.
I've been through so many meetings and partings. They were like a heavy secret, but when I started to talk about them, they seemed to sparkle... I couldn't put them into words.
If there's someone you wish to see, then you are no longer alone.
It's strange isn't it. The two groups, which looked like they hated each other, are now shining the same color as they vanish into the distant sky.
It's times like this that I wish I could come up with an appropriate response.  I hate myself for not being able to reply properly.
Nature itself is absurd. Humans are the only ones who whine about it.
Once you've been loved once and have loved once, you cannot forget it.
Sad memories are a part of what makes me who I am.
Snowdrop. I also don't know what I'm looking for. What does the future hold? Will I be able to not forget what I have found?
The voice, the smile that still remains in his heart... all of it was a long time ago. Humans live such short lives.
There are still times when our different ways of thinking make me hesitate but I feel like there are ways we can balance each other because we're different.
There are things you can't have no matter how much you want them. So it's easier to just forget them.
There were sad days, and painful ones and there may be more. Even so they're treasured days that I'll never forget.
They are those who come and go as they please. Even so, once you come to know them, even though there's no one else who notices them, it's a precious encounter that will keep your heart strong.
They come without asking, and then they leave just the same. But once you meet them, even if nobody ever knows it, that encounter will change your life for the better.
They're part of who I am. No matter how much they hurt, they're important to me.

This frustrating happiness... Days so warm it almost makes you dizzy. By this time next year... It may be time for me to stop looking away and know for real. Since I've decided to protect the Book of Friends... Since I decided to accept what I hear and see.
To leave the first tracks, we must go somewhere nobody's been yet.
Until just recently, the stars were something I only saw by myself.
When I look at their kind smiles and thought that I was supposed to be there smiling too... I couldn't stop crying. It hurt so much that I wanted to forget.
Why are you looking for something when you can't even remember what it is?
If the words are of rage and hate, I must accept them. I've run for so long but I can never forget.
What's been troubling me lately are these small farewells that make me feel a bit lonely. Brief meetings and farewells. I want to treasure each and every moment.
At the end of my life, it was just the two of us... You told me not to leave then so I decided not to go anywhere.
Even if a fool dies, he won't be cured.
Life is short, so fall in love, dear maiden, before your youthful ardor cools off, for there is no tomorrow.
When it's time for the flowers to bloom, they'll bloom. When it's time for spring to come, it'll come.
Without a body, I can't even cry. Why am I here? I can't go anywhere. I'm neither here nor there. Who am I here for? What am I here for?
Live a pleasant life in the unpleasant world.
Sometimes not lying can be a sin too, can't it?
The warmth of another person's flesh is scary. It thaws out the loneliness that you had forgotten about so easily.
If there's a start, there's a finish. There's no rain that doesn't stop falling at some point. Not as long as you're alive anyway.
My hands can cultivate the earth. They can plant trees and sow seeds. They can even carry the manager. But will I ever be able to make her smile like that?
I wanted to be a cat. I was jealous of them. They're liked by everyone... Even though they don't do anything at all. I just wanted everyone to like me.

It's not like people only look for help by saying "please help me." In similiar vein, it's not like you're only in love with someone if you say "I love you." Everyone has things they can't say on impulse.
Mistaking lust for love shows that you're caught in an inflationary spiral of sexual frustration.

You can come up with any number of reasons why you love someone. Like they are cool, or kind, or tall, or rich. There are all sorts of reasons you can say, but those are all lies. They're just excuses you tell yourself to rationally justify your emotions. Well, not so much excuses, as tricks. It's like a ladder you climb, based on the conclusion that you love them. When you feel like you want to be together forever, that's love.
It might be ridiculous to save the people. But when there are sad people in front of us... we can't just ignore them.
A smile is a seed of happiness. Anything can be made with it.
Noblesse oblige. You have the power but not using that power is a sin.
Are you not your own master? You should walk the path you desire. No one else should be able to stop you.
Mankind's greatest fear is Mankind itself.

Are you afraid of other people? I know that by keeping others at a distance you avoid a betrayal of your trust, but you must endure the loneliness. Man can never completely erase this sadness, because all men are fundamentally alone. Pain is something man must carry in his heart, and since the heart feels pain so easily, some believe that life is pain.
Humans cannot create anything out of nothingness. Humans cannot accomplish anything without holding onto something. After all, humans are not gods.
Humans constantly feel pain in their hearts. Because the heart is so sensitive to pain, humans also feel that to live is to suffer.
Songs are good. Singing brings us joy. It is the highest point in the culture that Lilims have created.
The thread of human hope is spun with the flax of sorrow.

So fucking what if I'm not you?! That doesn't mean it's okay for you to give up! If you do, I'll never forgive you as long as I live. God knows I'm not perfect either. I've made tons of stupid mistakes and later I regretted them. And I've done it over and over again, thousands of times. A cycle of hollow joy and vicious self-hatred. But even so, every time I learned something about myself.
Survivability takes priority.
This is your home now, so make yourself comfortable. And take advantage of everything here, except me.
Man fears the darkness, and so he scrapes away at the edges of it with fire. He creates life by diminishing the Darkness.
Those who hate themselves, cannot love or trust others.
The interaction of men and women isn't very logical.
If you know pain and hardship, it's easier to be kind to others.
Understanding 100% of everything is impossible. That's why we spend all our lives trying to understand the thinking of others. That's what makes life so interesting.
[after masturbating over Asuka's comatose body] I'm so fucked up.

I still don't know where to find happiness. But I'll continue to think about whether it's good to be here... whether it was good to have been born. But in the end, it's just realizing the obvious over and over again. Because I am myself.
Mankind has no time left.
No one can justify life by linking happy moments into a rosary.
[naked and smiling at Shinji] Hey Shinji, you idiot! Want to become of one mind and one body?
It is simply the duty of the elite to protect the ignorant masses.
My mind is being eaten away... Kaji-san, it's unravelling my mind! What do I do? It's defiling my mind!
This is the impenetrable wall of Jericho third child. Take one step over this wall, and you will be a dead man.
You're thinking in Japanese! If you must think, do it in German!
It's overpriced, but that's okay, HERE'S YOUR CHANGE!
As long as one person still lives...it shall be proof eternal that mankind ever existed.

Without what you call absolute power, we'll be able to live free and strong... That's why I have to end this. Humans often betray, fight and do terrible things to each other, but if I can feel this heat and this pain in my heart, a future where everyone will be kind to each other will definitely come some day. I can believe in it now!
I wonder if our hearts really do determine our feelings. Or are they just some sort of aroma in the air?
What about when you reciprocate someone else’s emotions? Is that still coming from you… or is the air connecting you to one another?
Phones, the internet - having the means alone doesn't lead to communication.
There’s no such thing as a person who doesn’t belong. You’re here because there’s someone who wants you to be here.
Embrace that feeling. Love’s never rational.
Hey! Don't you know the rules!? When heroes transform, ride in their machine, or stand in their main pose, no one should attack them!
When you go to save someone you have to consider yourself, as well. If you can’t all say “Thank Goodness” together, then those who are saved aren’t saved.
If you're always positive, good luck will eventually find you.
The ordinary days that we live in may, in fact, be a series of miracles.
Necessity knows no law!
If I'm getting in trouble no matter what I do, I may as well make a grand frontal assault and fight to my last breath.
Today, everything's shining brightly! The air, the people, and even this classroom; because today, I actually did my homework!
Look at the sky, it's so far away. But right here, right now, it seems so close.
Everyone has an ability. And it means that everyone should use that ability to the fullest.

To us, you are more valuable than any jewel. Would you be at ease if you left your most treasured valuable outside the bounds of your own home? A treasure is something you keep with you at all times. It is common sense.
There are two kinds of people in this world. Those who eat the things they hate first, and those who eat them last.
But... If you're the kind of person who can devote herself like that to someone, then I'll bet you anything there's someone out there who'll fall in love with you.
I'm used to gettting clobbered by her and all. But damn. A slap on the face hurts so much more.
You're right. Whether I ever see that girl again or not, that doesn't change the fact that this promise is important to me. I'm gonna go on treasuring it.
Once you find out whom you made the promise to, will you really be able to fall in love with her?
Time is not money. You can't buy time, now can you?

I'll tell you a way that I heard to figure out if you like someone or not. Imagine, when you find a rainbow, when you found a shooting star, when you found a cafe you like, when your change is 777 yen or something. If it's Raku, it's fine to imagine the first time a leaf stood up in your tea. When you found a beautiful sunset, or if you found your taste in music, or if you win a pretty good prize in the lottery, those small things in everyday life. When you encounter those small happiness or luck, who is the very first person you want to tell that to? Whose face came into your mind?
I've decided to take this unrequited love, and quietly put it away in a corner of my heart as a bittersweet page of my youth.

In the end, mustering the courage to confess is up to the people 

concerned.

It's just... a love that's continued for many years without straying is something that, to anyone who sees it, is beautiful and impossible to fault. But... Though it may be short, and it may be something that's become crooked and bent partway through, if they're serious about the way they feel... then I don't think that's something that isn't beautiful.
Making sure I have no regrets... that would just be self-serving, nothing more. It's all right. I mean, this is a great memory in itself, right?
Seeing them as the same is wrong. It's a touchy subject, but the weight of something you bear with your own power and with someone else's are different.

So you feel like you're being dishonest or something? That's not true. It's a great thing to come to like someone. If you ask me... The important thing here is, that you have to make a clear choice between the two of them.
The length of time you've been in love isn't the only thing that matters, right?
To enjoy my youth properly. She might've been talking about something like this. To live without thinking about consequences or what's around me with all my strength. That's what it was about...

Why did you run away, Chitoge-chan? No... I don't want this... I won't be happy with you just giving up... To end up liking the same person. It's painful, for sure but Chitoge-chan, you like him enough to not be able to face him again after that, don't you? Regardless of who ends up with him, I want to be satisfied when it happens. I thought for sure that you think the same way. Is there a reason why that can't happen? Tell me Chitoge-chan...
There's no law that says you can't go after someone just because he's already in love with someone else.
Traditions that don't benefit people today are worthless.

You have no intention of reciprocating my daughter's feelings, do you? So what gives you the right to speak in that way? Perhaps you wish to appease your guilty conscience. Would you not call that "hypocrisy"?

Holding in your own feelings like that... ye think tha' no one's gonna get hurt since ye're not lettin' it show to anyone? Tha's just the same as goin' 'round hurting everyone anyway!! What ye're doin' isn't ye keepin' everyone dear to ye!! Ye're just protectin' yerself!!! Ye're just 'fraid of gettin' hurt! Losin' yer nerve! Ye're just scared!!

I confessed you know!? Many, many times! Even though I knew the answer from my mouth... with my voice! I confessed you know!? Have you ever looked at Raku straight in the eyes!? Is that all you've got for Raku!? At least for the last time, you need to be a little more truthful to yourself!! If you really liked him, then you can't just pretend like nothing ever happened!!
I won't come to hate you! Never! Regardless of what happens in the future!
Love does not hurt when you're loving the right person.
My, my! Do I really need to spell it out for you? There is nothing that you can acquire without making a move on your own. It's the same with romance - your only hope is to be more aggressive.

Oh? What are you surprised about!? Do you think that I'm someone who would give up after being rejected just once!? Hospitalized or not, I shall continue to polish myself and become even moooore of a spectacular lady, and return to you!!
You can't achieve anything if you don't make a move. Love is an all-out assault.
It can't be helped, if there's nothing you can do, then there's nothing else you can do.
Even if the truth is as one suspects, it may still be worthless.
Just as there isn't a problem that can't be solved by being right, there isn't a problem that can't be solved by money.
The fake is of far greater value. In its deliberate attempt to be real, it's more real than the real thing.
The past is just the past. There's no inherent value in getting over it or catching up to it.
You can lose the match and the game, but if you don't lose to yourself, it isn't a loss.

It isn't just "others". Not "others". It's my Family. I'll force my ideals on my family. And since they're family, I'll lie to them. I'll deceive them. I'll cause them trouble. I'll make them worry. I'll owe them things, things I'll never be able to repay. However, I think that's okay. If you say that being an impostor is evil, then I will shoulder the burden of that evil. If lying is a bad thing, then I'm fine being the bad person. I don't need them to like me. I'm fine with being the worst kind of person.
The impostor is an impostor because it can't be distinguished from the real thing. The proof of its falsity is in its resemblance to the real thing.
I know love. The convenience store was selling it. For 298 yen.
I'm sure there's a reason that, even after I stopped being lost, I stayed here. I won't leave until I know what that reason is.

In a way, the supernatural is what's behind the curtain. Normally, you only need to see what's happening on stage. That's how reality works. If you don't know, it's best that you don't. Actually, learning about the supernatural only increases the number of things you don't know.
Sharing your secret with someone means you involve them in your problems. It may make things easier for you, but your family could end up suffering for it too.
But they say a woman is better off with an unloved man, versus a man who loves her.
No matter what bonds you forge with others, time will tear them apart. Well... Doesn't thinking about it make you sick?
We can't let the past be mere water under the bridge. Even so, there's no reason that we can't come together.
Any time one isn't familiar with something, it all looks the same. Knowledge and education are required to properly judge a thing.
It's easy for girls to take advantage of your kindness, so be careful.
I don't know everything. I just know what I know.
In their own way, fights are also a valid form of communication.
Whatever you value... What you consider right is up to you. But don't force those ideals onto other people.

A way for the weak to stay weak, but still defeat the strong. A way to stay who you are but surpass your limits. To soar through the sky, even if you can't fly. He's always found a way, inside despair, suffering and darkness.
This blank space represents infinite potential. One day, it may become anything.
Fulfilled people are just an urban legend.
"Checkmate" doesn't mean you've simply cornered the enemy king. It's a declaration that the enemy king is yours. That's why I said it the first time I met you. "Checkmate."
An idiot that knows he's an idiot, is even harder to deal with than an idiot that thinks he isn't.

Because of our weakness, we trained our eyes, ears and the ability to think. Learning how to survive, that's our trait as humans! The human species can't use magic and can't even perceive it—but because we are weak, we have the wisdom to run away from magic and the intelligence to see through it! We don't have any extraordinary senses. But because we are weak, by learning and gaining experience, we gained the wisdom to achieve the unachievable—to predict the future...Rejoice! We are humans; we are the most talented people! Precisely because we were born without any ability, we can achieve anything. This is the will of the weakest race!
Huh? In a real war, what fool waits for their enemy's "turn"?
I can conquer the world with one hand as long as you are Holding the other
In every time, in every world, the strong polish their fangs while the weak polish their wisdom.
In fairy tales, when the protagonists end up in a different world, they do their best to get back home, right? But who would want to go back to a world like that?
It's better for a man to be slow than fast.
It's our job as normal people to ensure the potential of those misunderstood ones are realized.
One of the things Blank loves best is saying 'No' to people who think they've got an absolute advantage.
Only idiots start fights they can't win.

Oppression. Rule by fear. dictatorships. It's a strange thing. Throughout history, for some reason, the lives of such rulers have always ended in the same way: Assassination by someone who isn't even part of a combat unit.
Sorry. Our world isn't as nice a place as yours. When it comes to war and killing, we have far more expertise than you do.
The natural enemy of the strong is the weak, but the natural enemy of the weak is not the strong - it is the ones that are even weaker.
There is more than one way to win a game. You can win without fighting!

There is no such thing as luck in this world. Rules, prerequisites, psychological states... There are any number of invisible factors that combine to produce an unpredictable, but inevitable result. The winner of each game is decided before it even begins. Chance is never a factor.
There's no more trusted observer than someone who suspects you.

They say people can change, but is that really true? If they decide they want to fly, will they grow wings? I don't think so. You don't change yourself, you change how you do things. You have to make your own way. You have to create a way to fly, even while you stay the same.

Throughout all of history, no wise king has ever forced his army to obey him through oppression. People will only truly fight for what is right. And there is only one thing that is truly right in this world! The one true, unchanging righteousness in the world is... cuteness! Cute makes right! All our needs, desires, and instincts seek cuteness, and it is for cuteness that we will give everything we have! That's just the way men are!
We do not stop playing games because we grow old, we grow old because we stop playing.
What kind of king makes his men fight at the front line while he sits behind them relaxing?

Whats the probability of drawing the ace of spades from a deck with no jokers? Normaly it would be 150. But what if its a brand new deck? The position of cards in a new deck are typically identical, so that means if you take out the jokers and draw the card at the very bottom, it's the ace of spades almost 100% of the time. Oh that's right! I didn't say a word about it being a new deck. Rather, you didn't ask. Being in the "no" gives you the power to turn the probability of winning from 1.92% to 100%. The more knowledge of a party will be the inevitable victor.
A temporary defeat is nothing if it leads to ultimate victory!
In reality, the least interesting answer is usually the correct one.
What do you think about your world? Is it fun? Is it easy to live in?
You know, in the end, people come home to the people they love most.
And your eyes were a strange colour that I'd never seen before. And they drew me in.

If I hadn't met you, I never would have realized what kind of person I am. I would have grown into an apathetic, clueless, obedient adult. However, after spending time with you, in tears, laughter, and anger, I now know that I have all these emotions inside me, too. And that makes me proud. I'm glad to have known you.
Where do people stray off the path? When do they begin to obey their greed rather than their ideals? Or are ideals just prone to morphing easily into greed?
Not every result can be the one desired. Trust your own judgments and actions. That is enough.
The truth can be concealed by the position one chooses to take,but can also be revealed once more.
It's my own business what I decide to do and where I decide to do it.
No matter how painful, no matter how much solitary struggle awaits us, because we have joyous moments like this, we can face the challenges over and over again.
The root of all evil is the kotatsu.
You can't sit around envying other peoples worlds. You have to go out and change your own.
Play to the last note, and leave no regrets.
Senpai, take me to the art museum again. Next time, I'll carefully listen to what you say. Please feed me worms!
You play like you're jacking off. [about Ryuu playing piano]
A sinner once passed away will never return, but sins will never vanish and the love will never die.
To be sure, love can kill, but always remember, hate can never save. Never!

If you hurt me, then so be it. Do you think that there is any human in all the world who has never hurt another? You are all so kind...It hurts you to hurt others. That is why I had been hiding my pain, as well.
You are human, are you not? You are allowed to make mistakes.
You asked me if I was ready to carry on. In all honesty, I am not sure of myself. But there is something that must be done now. And I will do it.

If you're in a position to save people, you should never even joke like that. My father...The doctor...Would never abandon anyone. He'd never give up on a person's life, even if they tried to throw it away.

I'm a coward. But I wanted to stay by your side. The truth is I was so happy to hear that you needed me, I took advantage of your words. But you're crying again, because of me. I'm no blessed vessel. I'm just a piece of junk. I was supposed to guide you, but this was the only way I knew how.
Loathe me, o fierce deity. Accept and awaken to your maelstrom of hate...god of calamity, Yato!
Duh!! There's no such thing as free wish.
Even if things are painful and tough, people should appreciate what it means to be alive.
Life and death are like light and shadow. They're both always there. But people don't like thinking about death, so subconsciously, they always look away from it.
Man, kids these days. They think it's a competition to have the most friends. One is enough. Find someone completely unique.

To put things simply, if your past makes your present... Then your present can and will make your future. When you think about it that way... You absolutely have the potential to be anything you want to be, don't you agree?
You should treat me with awe and wonder!
You shouldn't judge people by how they look.
You've finally realized that the one thing you want, something greater than money, it can never be yours.

data.show: Nura: Rise of the Yokai Clan
data.quote: Immersed in ecstasy from killing weak things... A burdensome corpse with no benefit to people. Someone like that... I can't possibly forgive!

Someone told me this: "Nothing is "forever" in human relationships". That might be true, but it sounds awfully lonely. But I realized today... If there really is no such thing as "forever"... Then having someone important is the happiest thing one can attain in life.

That's probably true. I like talking with people. I wonder if speaking with me is boring though. Since once people talk to me, they'll never do it again. But I don't feel like starting a conversation either, since in the direction I ought to look, there are only people who I cannot talk to. That's why I look at the sky... It's strange how merely observing things can be so handy to kill time. It hurts that I get called a weirdo just for making a habit out of it and in the end it just makes me stare at the sky even more. I've probably always been like this. Thinking about it, there's nothing I can do about my passiveness. Waiting things out is just my nature. I'm sure that... things will get better someday...
Whatever. It's okay, isn't it? Being dishonest with your feelings is part of who you are. If that would just suddenly change overnight, you'd be a different person.
A woman's jealousy is blacker than the oceans deepest chasm. You may all begin screaming now.
Even if it is shameless and vulgar, somewhere I seek some sort of connection with people.
Even if this is a twisted way to go about it, even if a guaranteed way to save our hearts cannot be found, even so, it doesn't mean that people like us don't try and struggle.
I never wanted anybody to hate me. I don't belong to any groups, and I have to fight and struggle to build myself up. In the end, all I want is just to not be hated by everyone.
I'm prepared for it all. Even if my chest hurts, even if I'm ripped apart, I won't let myself taste any regret.
If it's this world behind the eyelids, anybody can become the person I imagine them to be.
No matter how hard you try, you cannot exceed your true capabilities.
The shadow of your former self won't vanish.
A low possibility means it's not zero.
Those who use cheating as their weapon, will be strangled by cheating in the end.

To take responsibility is to take pain onto yourself. It means to bear more pain than what others felt because of your mistakes! If you ruined someone's silver tableware, you must repay with gold tableware. The president of a polluting manufacturing plant must live beside the plant's chimney. That's what taking responsibility means. However the people in so-called high positions never see the consequences. When mistakes are made, they will casually bow their heads and apologize. They think that's enough. Are you one of them too?
To take responsibility is to take the pain onto yourself. It means to bear more pain than what others felt because of your mistake.

What does it mean to be a winner? Is it the last one standing? It means to climb over a mountain of corpses to get to the top. By no means is it a glorious sight to behold, in fact, it is extremely cruel. Even so, if you still wish to seek victory... then you must become a devil.

What's the use of looking towards the past? If past data dictates reality... then our 33,1 winning percentage last year means we shouldn't even be playing the Mariners and their 66,7 winning percentage.
When a human is victorious is when they're most vulnerable.

Winning a game is not dependent on surpassing your opponents with your strength or waiting for lucky breaks. Conquer the opponent, crushing them, and stepping over the fallen ones ruthlessly. Winning means dominating over countless dead bodies.

Living is important! It is because one lives, one can enjoy things! Everyone has their own designated place and position in life! This man understands the futility of resisting against that fact! You see, not all living things, are born equal!
Whether I kick a kitten... Tear off your ears... Even slaughter innocent people... The world will never cease to forgive my actions! Why, you ask? That's right, it is because I am... Beautiful!!!
"Loneliness" is no longer part of my vocabulary.
All for one, one for all! There are times when a man has no choice but to act!
Death is never an apology.
I'm the afro-hair guy.
It's over when you give up.
Neither God nor the Devil can give aid to those without the will to fight…
No matter how deep the night, it always turns to day, eventually.

What do you know of death?!! Have you ever died?!! You think death will preserve your cause forever?!! Ridiculous!! Death leaves nothing behind!! Once a person passes on, nothing remains but dead bones!! If there is one thing I can’t stand, it is a person with no respect for life!!
What keeps me alive in this world is neither bodily organs, nor muscles - it's my soul!

"If I do this, I can stop the rebellion", "if I do that, I can stop the rebellion"... Open your eyes, princess! Your zealous idealism disgusts me! Ideals can only be spoken by those powerful enough to carry them out. And that excludes you!

"If I do this, I can stop the rebellion”, “if I do that, I can stop the rebellion”... Open your eyes, princess! Your zealous idealism disgusts me! Ideals can only be spoken by those powerful enough to carry them out. And that excludes you!

Wake up princess, I'm tired of your useless ideals. It's gotten pathetic. What good are your happy ideals if you can't do anything to make them a reality? They're nothing but dreams, and your dreams don't stand a chance.

I lost my mother when I was 8...and killed my father when I was 10. Those with the title of "Executive" or above...are my "family", with whom I've shared my joys and sorrows. They're the only thing I have! I won't forgive anyone that laughs at my family. Understood?

Pirates are evil? The Marines are righteous? These terms have always changed throughout the course of history! Kids who have never seen peace and kids who have never seen war have different values! Those who stand at the top determine what's wrong and what's right! This very place is neutral ground! Justice will prevail, you say? But of course it will! Whoever wins this war becomes justice!
That's ridiculous. People usually have a stereotypical idea, or an assumption like that and that's what creates a blind spot
That's right! Whatever the tragedy or the blunder is, only the things that actually happened are written in stone!

The time is almost here. Go and lay the groundwork. A world where only true pirates can survive will soon be upon us. Those without power, flee while you can. The tide will bring those of unmatched power and the New Era will begin!
The weaker person is the more he gets hung up on other people's pain and then he self-destructs
There is a difference in the look of the ordinary vagabond and that of a determined man.
I'll die smiling! Because if you ever think of me in the future, I want you to remember me smiling.

When do you think people die? When they are shot through the heart by the bullet of a pistol? No. When they are ravaged by an incurable disease? No. When they drink a soup made from a poisonous mushroom!? No! It’s when... they are forgotten.
I'm not stupid enough to use a cannon to hunt a rabbit.
My name is Dracule Mihawk! Find your self, true world, become stronger! No matter how long it may take, I will wait for you in my strongest form! Surpass this sword! Surpass me! Roronoa Zoro!
The world has too many heroes. It needs a monster.
You are defeated yet you will not step back, why not?

I am lightning. No matter how hard they try, mankind can never overcome lightning. Since ancient times, mankind has labeled the unknowns of nature as God. And anything they could not understand, they feared. Everything which befalls mankind is said to be the work of God. Mankind accepts that it cannot defeat natural disasters. And I am one of them.
Compared to the "righteous" greed of the rulers, the criminals of the world seem much more honorable. When scum rules the world, only more scum is born.
I am crazy and stubborn.
If you lose credibility by just admitting fault, then you didn't have any in the first place.
If you were to be troubled over something as trivial as losing face, then it's better to not have it at all.
Destiny. Fate. Dreams. These unstoppable ideas are held deep in the heart of man. As long as there people who seek freedom in this life, These things shall not vanish from the Earth.
The world...what a glorious place! Seek freedom, and it will lie stretched out before your eyes. If the endless dream guides your restless spirit, seize it! Raise your flag, and stand tall!
It is a sad truth that greater the authority a person possesses, the more he tends to fear change.
Don't just think about the ones you have lost. You can't get back what you have lost. What is it that you still have ?

It may be hard right now... But you must silence those thoughts! Stop counting only those things that you have lost! What is gone, is gone! So ask yourself this: What is there... that still remains to you?!
You can't bring back what you've lost, think about what you have now!
Without strength, you won't be able to save anyone.
The thing called "justice" changes its shape... Depending on where you stand.
Someday, I promise you, they will all watch as I change the world.
There can be no happiness in a world where the undesirables are thrown away.
*To Captain Kuro* So, you don’t like to get hit, huh? Well, you’re about to have a very bad day.
An island from a dream within a dream? I could never pass up a great adventure like this!
Are we friends? Or are we foes? That kind of thing you decide for yourselves!
Being alone is more painful than getting hurt.
Forgetting is like a wound. The wound may heal but it has already left a scar.

Hero? No! We're pirates! I love heroes, but I don't wanna be one! Do you know what heroes are? Say there is a chunk of meat. Pirates will have a banquet and eat it, but heroes will share it with other people. I want all the meat!
I'm gonna kick your ***.
If I get reincarnated... I wanna become a clam.
If you don't risk your life, you can't create a future. Right?
If you don't take risks, you can't create a future.
If you hurt somebody... or if somebody hurts you, the same red blood will be shed
No matter how hard or impossible it is, never lose sight of your goal.
Power isn't determined by your size, but the size of your heart and dreams!
So, you don't like to get hit, huh? Well, you're about to have a very bad day.
Then just become stronger. I have my ambition, you have your ambition too. Which means you should just keep walking forward towards that goal.
There is something mysterious about the life of a pirate.

We are NOT asking him where the treasure is hidden!!! We're not even asking him whether there IS any treasure or not!! I'm not sure, but... ...everybody set out to sea, risking their lives to search for it!!! If you ask this old man anything about it here and now... Then I'll quit being a pirate! I don't want to go on a boring adventure like that!
You came without fear. Don't have any regrets, no matter what happens. This is the duel you wanted.
You want to keep everyone from dying? That's naive. It's war. People die.
Even in the depths of Hell... blooms a beautiful flower of friendship... leaving its petals as mementos... bobbing back and forth on the waves... may it one day bloom once more...the Okama Way.
I'm the smartest member in the Straw Hat group.
Life is like a pencil that will surely run out, but will leave the beautiful writing of life.
Before the heart of truth, there is no need for words.
Fools who don't respect the past are likely to repeat it.
They call me the "demon child".
Even if armed with hundreds of weapons... there are times when you just can't beat a man with a spear of conviction in his gut.
If you hurt somebody or if someone hurts you, - the same red blood will be shed.
Inherited will, the swelling of the changing times, and the dreams of people. These are things that cannot be stopped. As long as people seek the answer to freedom, these will never cease to be!

They are more like “people who don’t follow rules…” There are different kinds of people in different worlds! … Between you two and them, what is the difference? It isn’t unusual… to put it to an extreme… A hero during a war would be just another murderer in peaceful times.
We cannot direct the wind, but we can adjust the sails.
I don't wanna live a thousand years. If I just live through today, that'll be enough.
Old man, everyone!! And you.. Luffy. Even though I've been good for nothing my whole life, even though I have the blood of a demon within me... You guys still loved me! Thank you so much!!
Sometimes the blood rushes to my head and I feel like, if I run I'll lose something important.
Sometimes, the blood rushes to my head and I feel like, if I run, I'll lose something important.
We have to live a life of no regrets.
Being strong isn't just about having power or move, it about one's spirit
Bring on the hardship. It's preferred in a path of carnage.
Either in belief or doubt, if I lean to one of these sides, my reaction time will be dulled if my heart thinks the opposite of what I choose.
I don't care what the society says. I've regretted doing anything. I will survive and do what I want to.
I'm a pirate hunter.
If I die here, then I'm a man that could only make it this far.
Only those who have suffered long, can see the light within the shadows
So, are you stupid enough to fall for such a stupid trap that such stupid people set up?
When the world shoves you around, you just gotta stand up and shove back. It's not like somebody's gonna save you if you start babbling excuses.
You need to accept the fact that you're not the best and have all the will to strive to be better than anyone you face.
You sure can talk the talk, but you're not quite ready to walk the walk. Time's up, it's my turn.
You want to kill me? You couldn't even kill my boredom!

You've underestimated me, snow woman. When you thought you couldn't beat me, you should have run. Of course, there are things that I don't wanna cut. But... let me ask you something.
Have you ever seen a fierce animal you were sure would never bite? Because I haven't.
A real man is someone who forgives a woman for her lies!
Black leg!
Don't start a fight if you can't end it.
Don't start a fight that you can't finish.
I couldn't confess my feelings for you, so I watched you from afar, being happy with someone else.
Leave this guy's key to me, I'll do what you cant do; you do what I can't do. Think carefully! Read the situation. If you're here, there's got to be a way Robin-chan can be saved! Usopp!
Men who can't wipe away the tears from a women's eyes, aren't real men.
There is no such thing as being born into the world to be alone.
Don't try to find a reason for somebody's love!!
By experiencing both, victory and defeat, running away and shedding tears, a man will become a man.
Maybe nothing in this world happens by accident. As everything happens for a reason, our destiny slowly takes form...
Don't ever think there's any perfect society made by humans!! If you think that way you'll overlook the enemy!! Don't be fooled by appearances!!
Why did he smile? Why? Did he know he would be saved? No. In that instant, he must have understood that his life was going to end. Death. He accepted it. He was fully prepared for it and smiled.
I realized that back then, the reason I wanted to become human, was that I really just wanted to have friends. Now, I just want to be a monster that can help Luffy.
I want a devil fruit.
The weak don't get to decide anything, not even how they die.
There are things you can't see unless you change your standing.
You can't see the whole picture until you look at it from the outside.
I'm the sniper king, sogeking.
Man or Child, Strong or Weak, None of those matter once you are out at sea!

When I left Syrup Village, I left everything behind! Tranquility… Safety… They face hardships every day, and they laugh like they’re really having fun! That’s why I decided to go out to sea! I want to laugh ’til I cry, too! But if I don’t fight with everything I’ve got, there’s no way I deserve to be on the same boat as them! There’s no way I can laugh with them!

About Whitebeard "Even in death, his body did not fall. His figure, taking down enemies while losing half of his head, was truly monstrous. The total number of sword wounds he received in this battle was 267. He was shot by 152 bullets. And was hit by 46 cannonballs. And despite all this, his proud back, over the course of his entire life as a pirate, never received a single scar from running away!"
It doesn't matter who your parents were. Everyone is a child of the sea.
You are too young to worry about failure. In a pinch, just muddle through. The outcome won't change, so that's best.
You are calm and intelligent, but youth can invite disaster. Do not fight alone.
