You can’t take back the answer you already gave out. There’s no use in crying over spilt milk. The egg you broke won’t come back. All the horses and soldiers of a king will never return to his side again.
It doesn’t matter what was said. You can never wipe away a bad impression.
Even though the opposite is so simple in comparison. Just one word will make someone appear hateful. Just doing one thing would make you seem hateful.
That’s why excuses are meaningless. Because even those excuses will make you look hateful.

data.show: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Come wa Machigatteiru. Zoku
data.quote: Identity? What? The people who yap about identities all the time are usually the ones with no identity. Like something that changes so easily could really be an "identity", anyway.

data.show: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Come wa Machigatteiru. Zoku
data.quote: A person's mentality and feelings aren't always equal. There are times the conclusion you arrive at is completely irrational and the reason is because of that.

data.show: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Come wa Machigatteiru. Zoku
data.quote: Don't understand? Then think more. If you can only think by calculating, then keep doing so until you can't. Think of all the answers you can and destroy them one by one with the process of elimination. Whatever remains is your answer.

data.show: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Come wa Machigatteiru. Zoku
data.quote: Getting into trouble is not a bad thing. It's proof that someone is watching you.

data.show: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Come wa Machigatteiru. Zoku
data.quote: If you could calculate feelings, then we'd be in a digital age by now... The remaining answer that you couldn't calculate is what they call the feelings of people.

data.show: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Come wa Machigatteiru. Zoku
data.quote: It is impossible to not hurt someone. Humans unconsciously hurt others by simply existing. Whether you are alive or dead, you keep hurting people. Getting involved will hurt them, but trying not to get involved might hurt them too. But if it's someone you don't care about, you won't notice you've hurt them. What's important is your awareness of it. It's because you care about them, that you feel like you've hurt them. Caring about someone means being resolved to the fact that you'll hurt them. The more people care for each other, the farther out of reach certain things get. But that's not something to be sad about, I think it's probably something to be proud of.

data.show: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Come wa Machigatteiru. Zoku
data.quote: People usually don't look back to see how far they've come while they're still walking. Of course, when they come to a standstill, the more progress they've made, the more betrayed they feel by their expectations.

data.show: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Come wa Machigatteiru. Zoku
data.quote: People's thoughts don't always mirror how they feel. That's why they sometimes make decisions that seem nonsensical.

data.show: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Come wa Machigatteiru. Zoku
data.quote:
The present isn't everything, but there are things you can only do now, things you can only find here. 
It's now or never. Think, Writhe, Struggle and agonize. If not, what you are going through isn’t genuine.

data.show: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Come wa Machigatteiru. Zoku
data.quote: Your impression of people is renewed every day. As you spend time with them and grow with them, you come to understand more.

data.show: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Come wa Machigatteiru. Zoku
data.quote: Why is it that what I want, and what's expected of me are so similar, yet so different?

data.show: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Come wa Machigatteiru. Zoku
data.quote: Even if we know each other, understanding each other is another matter.

data.show: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Come wa Machigatteiru. Zoku
data.quote: If this is all it takes to tear us apart, then maybe we weren't all that close to begin with.

data.show: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Comedy wa Machigatteiru
data.quote: A lone warrior surviving hundreds of battles, when it comes to losing, I'm the strongest.
Girls' hearts are reflected by their underwear's color...!!
Why can't I steal him from her? There are no rules in the game of love!

Knowing what's in store for me means I have nothing to look forward to. If I know something good's going to happen... then when it does, I'm only half as happy about it because I knew in advance. And then when I know something bad is going to happen... when it does, I get overwhelmed with this sense of defeat... and feel even worse.
Is there some rule that says I have to give up just because I was rejected?!
You can erase the memories, but you can't erase the feelings behind them.
Because I love you, I want to rip you apart. I want to pile corpses before you.
Humans are weak. For every cure found, another disease is uncovered. It's a game of chase.
No one knows what the future holds in life.  We must take that endless bit of darkness and turn it to our advantage.

The root of all your evil is in always relying on one of your other possibilities to get your wish. You must accept that you are the person here, now, and that you cannot become anyone else other than that person.

data.show: Yokai Rise Of The Nura Clan
data.quote: Light is radiant because there is darkness. And darkness is sublime because there is light.
Miracles are illusions caused by insufficient observation and understanding. They're just... glorious misunderstandings.
You should try persuasion when people are mentally defenseless. The fascist who proposed that was a demonic genius.

data.show: Youkoso Jitsuryoku Shijou Shugi no Kyoushitsu e
data.quote: All people are nothing but tools. It doesn't matter how it's done. It doesn't matter what needs to be sacrificed. In this world, winning is everything. As long as I win in the end...That's all that matters.
To stop or to keep going? The one who decides is yourself.
Your emotions have nothing to do with winning or losing,  but they're motivating us more than you might expect.
Don't make me slap you upside the head, just shoot the damn thing!
I fight to get what I need, and I kill whoever gets in my way. I always have.
I know you play by higher standards, but at least give me credit for the nose.
I'm not a fighter of good. I just hate people who are bad.
Oh, silly me. I must have forgotten to turn on my hearing aid. When you're a washed up old hag like me, the memory is the first to go.
Thanks for the real vote of confidence. You two should be cheerleaders, you'd look cute in skirts!
This is the world you've stuck yourself into, if you aren't strong enough to lead, then you lose the privilege of getting what you want.
Use the Spirit Wave to float on top of the spike. Good. Now we'll hold this for twelve hours.
What a silly little girl I was, thinking you would change. I should have known how you would turn out. You had it written in ugly black letters all across your soul.
You've trapped yourself in a body you hated hiding in the pain, and now you want to torture yourself again for eternity...haven't we both paid enough?

Yuusuke... Dammit Yuusuke, listen to me! Everyone has to fight with time to find their place before their inevitable death. Toguro... he ran away from that fight. Don't you ever do the same. No human is ever a one man show. Every decision that you make will affect the countless people who care about you. Do you understand? You can't be a cocky kid anymore.
(To Sensui) Here's a one way ticket straight to Hell! YOU BASTAARD!
Being lucky seems to be your greatest tactic.

Detective, don't waste your time trying to change their minds. Fight by their meaningless rules and you'll be pulled down with them. There's only one real law of the dark tournament: the strongest man prevails. I've retrieved enough energy to rip my way out, let's show this entire stadium a new definition for victory!
Do I have to kill you to stop you from being foolish?
Does a death wish cause you to talk to me that way?
Don't worry fool, we've entered into an alliance and I'm not the type to break it. Of course, after we win the tournament I can't guarantee anything.

Even as a child, I found tremendous pleasure in spilling my enemy's blood. Their screams of agony were my music. Once I learned that my mother's frozen tear drop was valuable, I began wearing in open sight of everyone, hoping their greed would entice them to challenge me, thus giving me the opportunity for my next kill.
He's swinging his sword with the grace of a flyswatter. That's no way to survive.
I know as much of games as I do of hugs and puppies, and care for them even less. Wake me for the end of the world.
I've been under too much stress lately. Killing you should be a good remedy.
Kurama, do not make me come over there and remove that precious thing you call a voice box.
Kurama, there is no person who does not carry scars upon their heart, and if there were such a man, they would be a shallow soul.
My arm did not obey a certain command I gave it, so I decided it needed to be punished.
Ninjas are revolting, they stole my idea. I'll have to kill them now.

Obviously you are underestimating Kurama. Do you know why I chose him to be my partner? To avoid fighting him myself. Watch, he's more cut-throat then I am when it comes to battle, and unbelievably precise.
Tell me, how does it feel to live in a constant haze of stupidity?
Their mistakes were simple ones. Gouki's mistake was being overconfident and Kurama's... sympathy for his human prey.
This is pure offense. They gave up fighting with their brains a long time ago.
This is the second time today I hold your life in my hands. I somehow doubt that Sensui will be more merciful than I am.
What repulsive creature makes my eardrums bleed?
You do them one favor and they think you're their best friend. This is why I could care less if their entire species was swallowed up.
You're a team player, a save-the-day superhero... I hate people like you.
If you think about it, death really isn't so frightening. Who knows, you might actually enjoy it.
(In response to Seaman's question) When real men do what they're supposed to, it's not always about what they want.
*to Urameshi* Sacrificing your life to save billions of others. You've lit our torches and I won't let your death be in vain... even if it means I'll be joining you soon.
Aw, man. You're such a friggin' disgrace. I can't believe I spent so much time trying to defeat such a coward. Now get up and fight!
Bite my ankles shorty, I swear I'll make you cry to your mom! If you have a mom, that is!
Hey! Shorty's a lot cooler than I thought.
How about I gently shove my foot down your throat?
It smells girly. I don't think I like it.
Kurama really is a fox thing, and to think I let him near my kitten!
Of all the nerve, assault me and then ask for a meal, you're getting squat!
Please no eat me, please no eat, no!
Stop laughing hamster legs!
That rose whip of his must be ten feet long. Where does he stash it? All the ways I can think of sound kinda painful.
That's it! My head as a trampoline is where I draw the line!
Ugly?! Who you callin' ugly?! C'mere you mouse!
Urameshi, I'm gonna mess your face up so bad that kittens won't even look at you.
We all have to die when our time comes, but if we do our duty we don't got regrets. So taste a little piece of my sword, Toguro!
Why does everything you say makes me wanna bash your face in?
You know, I really can't stand it when guys pick on people weaker than them...but I guess I'll do it to you anyway!
In addition to knowing the secrets of the universe, I can assure you, I am quite potty trained.
A poor choice seals our fate.
Agh, it penetrates my brain!
All the while we've been thinking you were a brilliant strategist when really, you're just a lucky fool.
Any prize worth having requires a risk.
Does he really believe we would turn around after all that we've been through?
I think Monster Beast Doughnut is a perfect name.
I thought clowns made everyone else laugh.
I'll help you... But not by death, this world has enough of that. You can keep your life as long as you change the way you live it. It's never too late, believe me.

I'm warning you. You so much as bruise what you hold in your hand and I will show you pain. The hue of your soul will cease to matter, because you will not be judged when you die, you will no longer to exist.
It most certainly isn't pleasant being called a "traitor" by creatures you've never met.
Logic is panic's prey.
Nerd violence...
Regret is a different beast when you live for centuries.
Rely on impulse and not even your thoughts can betray you.
Sorry, I don't have time to be arrested.
Tired hands are better than none.
Underestimating an opponent is the first step towards defeat.
We've gone far past the stage of fighting for our honor.
What irony. Such beauty, sprung from such an ugly soil.
You should know better than to corner an animal like a fox... We have a tendency to show our teeth.
You try to sound like you think things through, when in fact, you're not thinking at all.

You were wrong on two counts. Even the hardest substance can be broken, when crashed into itself. And the ability to feel pain is not a weakness. It’s a strength. Pain tells a creature its vulnerabilities, and not you expose them to attack. Your robot is dead. And so, I’m afraid, are you.
Drop ink on the finest snow-white paper and it will inevitably absorb into black. Its purity demands it. Tainted men have immunities. Black does not absorb black.
Nothing worse than being strong, but not strong enough.

It's simple. Even the strongest tree will die if left in the dark. I find that to be the best way to describe us. A giant oak, crashing through a dark soil, bringing order to an otherwise chaotic land. The Shinobi have done their job for centuries, and done it well. But in recent years, we have caught glimpses of the outside world, and asked: "Why not us? Have we not earned the privilege others take for free?".
I consider your class of demon very worthy, worthy to fight, and worthy to die.
And so it all begins. This boy's name is Yusuke. He's 14 years old and is supposed to be the hero of the story... but oddly enough, he's dead.
Alright already, you had me at shut up.
Damn, at least one of us should've died!

Fine! You heard fox boy, there's nothing we can do for the old hag if she's already limp. Just gotta keep on truckin, yes sir! I'm gonna go outside and make myself a nice, big, shiny first-place medal, sit in the sun, and have a stupendous friggin day, dammit!
First you say I'm faster then you get the heads up on me like I'm an old lady crossing the freeway! Just once I'd like some honesty from the bad guys!
I don't care if it's a girl, a baby or someone's grandma. I'm gonna fight her anyway.
I don't know what you're trying to pull, but I'm not into this kinky stuff, and you're WAY too old!
Kuwabara, come back! You're like an ugly singer with a good voice, best for backup!

Maybe there've been times when I've been pissed and hated things, but it wasn't from this work. My dad's a no-show, my mom's lush and school sucks, but this job is the one damn thing I'm good at. If all the crap in my life hasn't screwed up yet, then neither will this and neither will you.
So maybe I can't defend against attacks from multiple angles, but sometimes a good defense is just kicking ass!
So sorry you caught me on such a bad day, it makes me a real jerk!
This is DUUUMMMBBB!!!!!!
Ugly people shouldn't be allowed to smile that much!
What are you waiting for, your balls to drop?
What the hell was that? All my punches were solid, but he brushed them aside like broccoli he didn't order! Didn't even give me a chance to kick his ass!
You can't end a good party without someone on the floor.
You know, it'd really be embarrassing to get eaten by something that came out of an egg this tiny.
You shouldn't talk. It makes you sound stupid.
You took my teacher, and now I let you take my friend. What the hell do you want from me?

Yusuke Urameshi, age 14. Survived by his mom and everybody. After going through a big ordeal to get his life back, Yusuke had a brief second chance until he was eaten by a fish! That's right! No heroic death! No fighting evil villans! Fish food!
Nothing in this world is free. Be thankful to those who speak strict word to you. Watch out for a person who talks too nicely.
[sounding like Marlon Brando] I'm the Godfather of Games. Capsice?
Hey Kaiba, maybe we should duel sometimes.
I coulda been a contendah...
I found out I hate virtual dogs.
My treasure... you can see it, but you cannot! So I can´t show it to you! It´s friendship! We can see it in each other, but you can't see courage itself, right?
*after Joey offers him to duel* No thanks, I think I'll have much more of a challenge playing solitaire.
Games are not boring. Games purify our souls and leave room for new development that challenges the mind! They are the products of human wisdom!
Let me get this straight. You're going to defeat me with a creampuff and an elf?

*to Kaiba* Yugi may have lost one lousy Duel Monsters game, but at least he hasn't lost his heart! Not like you - you've spent so much time with your machines, you've forgotten what being human is about! Yugi has a heart, Kaiba. Yugi has us. And what about you, Seto Kaiba? What do you have at the end of the day? Tell me. Tell me!
No matter how dark things may get, the special bond I share with my friends will always find a way to shine through! I may be scared, but that fear won't keep me from dueling!
I'm gonna take you out in one giant bug blitzkrieg!
Say good-bye to The Unstoppable Exodia!
Exodia, OBLITERATE!!!
If you can't understand the darkness in your opponent's heart, you will never comprehend the pain and suffering of others.
It's game time!
My grandfather's deck has no pathetic cards, Kaiba. But it does contain... the unstoppable Exodia!
Ready or not, Spirit, this is where you take over.
You've fought a valiant duel, my friend, and this is the hardest move I've ever had to make. But this ends now!
The past is gone, you can not change it! But the future is based on the decision you make!

When we first met, you set my heart ablaze. When I see you, all I can do is gaze. Gaze at the beauty and wonder that is you. The constellation Gemini will make me think of me and you. You are my Yami and I am your Hikari. I love you, my Yami. Now and forever.
The future isn’t written yet. There’s still time for things to change!
Stop trying to change things that can't be changed. The past is the past and you have to let it go and embrace the future.
No matter how careful your risk hedging is, there will still be holes in your plan! Realizing them and making sure that they are promptly dealt with, is the duty of those who stand at the top.
This is your world. As an outsider it may be out of place to say this... But I want to make one thing clear: Mere observers have no right to decide the future!
Forgiveness is the only way to end the war.
A world created through oppresing others with brute force has no meaning!

Smiles are what connect people! It allows them to communicate through their souls! Connected souls will never lose to the strength that only relies on control! Dueling is the same! Only strength alone doesn't speak to anyone's soul!
Smiles are what connect people! It allows them to communicate through their souls! Souls that are connected... Will never lose to power that only relies on control!
Sorry. I don't believe in fate. I explore my future with my own strength. Good or bad, it's my own choice.
There are things you can't turn back, even if you want to.
If I can do it tomorrow, I won't do it today!

data.show: Zero no Tsukaima: Futatsuki no Kishi
data.quote: The more you rush, the less careful you become. Even a cautious rat will show its tail.

data.character: Louise Françoise Le Blanc de La Vallière
data.show: Zero no Tsukaima: Futatsuki no Kishi
data.quote: Death comes at the very end, doesn't it? Until that time comes, do your best at living!

data.character: Louise Françoise Le Blanc de La Vallière
data.show: Zero no Tsukaima: Futatsuki no Kishi
data.quote: I don't want to die, either. But I'm an aristocrat. It's an honor to die for one's people. You make fun of it, but is it that insignificant to die for everyone else?

data.show: Zero no Tsukaima: Futatsuki no Kishi
data.quote: So what if you're an aristocrat?! Dying for the sake of honor is something an idiot does!

data.show: Zero no Tsukaima: Princess no Rondo
data.quote: It's only natural for a man to protect the girl he likes.
It's when things are tough that you have to keep your head up high. You won't find hope lying on the ground.

Everything happens for a reason. The daily tragedies and misfortunes are all meaningful events, leading toward an ideal conclusion. With that in mind, there probably isn't really any meaningless misfortune.
It might be for the better if there are amusing people around me. Because any tragedy may seem a comedy, as long as I am with them.
Just because it's illogical, that doesn't make it wrong.
Rumors, at times, can be more severe than the truth.
The actors on stage cannot ignore their scripts and do as they wish. If they make a beautiful exit, I feel they fulfill their role.
The beginning is the end, and the end is the beginning. Well then, let us begin again. And to each, their own tale.
The subtle light that is born when people's feelings come together. That light embraces felicity, evil, sin, and happiness. The light blazes forth... illuminating the whole truth.
Even if he hates me, being able to die with the knowledge that the one I love will never forget me… there is no greater happiness a woman could desire.
There are no convenient miracles, and there is logic that should be inviolable.
To lose the woman you loved, not even being able to grieve… if not a tragedy, what is it?
What's wrong with wanting to keep the man you love out of harm's way?
When you do something for the man you love, instead of for the world, it's easier to decide what must be done. Ultimately, it's better to do things for someone rather than something.
If you dislike the situation, use your strength to change it.

Hamlets mistake is that he believed in something like a ghost, that doesn't exist. The second he believed in something irrational, he was doomed. Those are just delusions imagined by the living. Once you're dead, that's it. The dead don't return, nor do they hear our wishes. It's all an illusion. Things you forgot to say, things you couldn't say... they want ghosts to hear them, so they dream one up. It's also possible that people imagine their desire as ghosts.
I won't live my life by another person's script.
I'll do whatever it takes to have everything make sense again!
In this crazy-ass world, there's no point in playing the blame game.
O anger, turn to heat, dry up my brains! This mad thirst for vengeance must be quenched… no matter how cruel and merciless I must become!
Only sadness can counter sadness.

To you, life was just something you acted out and ended, all according to someone else's script. That's why you were always quoting Shakespeare. However, Aika, I say that you were wrong! You did what you shouldn't have, and didn't do as you should have. Because you relied on someone else's script, you were wrong. I won't live my life by another person's script. Not by Hamlet or The Tempest. I don't know how many years in the future it will be... but I'll write and act my own ending.
We don't know if this world is real or a dream. Maybe the world until now has been a convenient fake. But magic will probably disappear now. The dream is over.
What would you ask a grave, which can never reply? What do you pray for? Saying anything after someone's death is far too late.
A girlfriend isn't something you get just because you want one. You meet someone you like, and you want to spend time together. That's why you'd want that person as your girlfriend, right?
But even if I acted sad over it, nothing would change. Even if I cry, nothing would change.
Forty thousand brothers could not, with all their quantity of love, make up my sum.
How much weight can a simple promise carry?
It's not over yet. If we don't end it, nothing can start. Even if nothing at all begins, we must still put an end to it.
Let's face the truth, without relying on any dreamlike power.
Lovers don't need words to communicate.
Miracles are irrational by nature.
Tomorrow's promise will never come. I wonder how many of tomorrow's promises have disappeared as though they have never existed.
What exactly would change if I wanted revenge, was consumed by hatred, or went insane with rage?
This world is far more complicated, rich and full of mystery, than people think.
If I described him in one word, it'd be di*k[beep]!
